Silk Road forums

Discussion => Off topic => Topic started by: drugfather on December 22, 2011, 07:22 pm

Title: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: drugfather on December 22, 2011, 07:22 pm
********DISCLAIMER********



PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE YOU POST:

The sole purpose of making this thread is for a simple introduction to who you are as a person and what the community can look forward to what you have to offer.

PLEASE do not disclose any personal information that could identify you or say anything that could incriminate YOU.
Also, do not disclose any personal information about anyone else nor discuss any information that simply does not need to be put in this thread. I will report any post that doesn't fall within these guidelines.



I am not responsible for any information disclosed in this thread.

Any information released is proprietary to the original poster.





_______________________________________________________________________________



Having running multiple forums in the past, on some forums there were certain privileges assigned with making your first post or certain limitations if you hadn't made your first post. Therefore, there was always an introductory thread where new members could say a little something about themselves to help welcome them into the community.

That being said, I thought it'd be a nice thing if Silk Road had the same thing!  :)

So take a minute to introduce yourself and let the community know what you're about!



Thanks,

DF
drugfather.




P.S.: I'll make my introduction as a separate post.
Title: My Introduction
Post by: drugfather on December 22, 2011, 07:33 pm
Hi everyone. I am drugfather or "DF" for short. I'm fairly new to the site but as a member I have exponentially grown. I am always on the lookout for ways to improve the site. I try to befriend reputable vendors and Silk Road (SR) staff to where I can make an impact to improve the SR system and community. I'm currently a freelance coder/designer with a degree in organic chemistry and pharmacology. I'm fairly young and I'd like to go back to school to extend my pharmacology degree to a Ph.D. At that point, I could be pretty successful at the two things I love the most: drugs and the chemistry of drugs. I'm an opiate lover with good self control so I'm lucky I haven't become an addict (yet) :p My #1 love will always be Mary J. I'm here for any chemistry/design/webcoding help if needed. Just shoot me a PM.

Well. That about wraps it up for me.

-DF
drugfather
Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: lmfao on December 22, 2011, 09:10 pm
Hi, my name is lmfao and I like to play video games online like MMORPGs. I live with my friend Sora and sometimes she plays the games with me too, but I usually play more than she does. I consult for a company, but I'm practically employed there as I've been working for them for about 6 years now. I graduated from University in 2001 with studies in physics. I'm currently looking to work on my postgraduate degrees overseas, possibly in America. If I ever move to America, I'd like to start a family with Sora. We've already decided on names for a boy or girl! (Or both. Haha)
Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: oppyate on December 23, 2011, 12:04 am
Greetings...(cough, cough) my name is oppyate and I am an Oppi-Holic. Arrived on SR as result of Hawker Blog on SR. Was really getting Ripped-Off by On-Line Pharmacies to tune of over $1500, India, Cameroon and Canada. al scams, BUT, I kept beleiving there was a "Source" out there somewhere that could be Trusted most of the time, where there would be Good Customer Service, Honesty, Manners and Integrity. SR thus far has been that and more. The Forums and exchanges with Buyer and Vendors give you a pulse..an Indirect knowledge of Buyers and Vendors. Good, Bad or Indifferent.

In a few months this place will be One Year Old, it's up to those that really care about SR to "do the right thing."

oppyate

One of the older accounts to stick around. I'm always up to talk to newbies if they need help.

Peace,
DigitalAlch

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: PoisonedDestiny on December 24, 2011, 09:23 am
hi everyone!  i'm destiny and i discovered SR while chatting in a RC forum.  i didn't even believe the thing was for real until i read a very pro SR article online.  i lurked on here and studied up for that last like 2 months and in the last 2 weeks have made my first purchases.  i have had nothing but good luck so far on here and hope the streak continues.  i seek out U.S. produced hash, MDMA, and desperately want some actual latex extracted opium.  when a listing for it came up a few weeks ago (not sure if it was legit or not) i was so frustrated because my btc wouldn't be in fast enough. 

i'm a victim of the drug war, which stole a good number of years from me and took away a well paying job because i possessed the wrong type of powdered chemical. 
currently i work a rather menial job while finishing up a degree in IT.  i'm a rather wild girl but have a very strong rational side, i love technology and science.  i currently have a wonderful partner (yes boys i prefer women, but consider myself pansexual) and she has been joining me on this exploration of the realm of the mind.  it's been so fun watching her have her first roll, get giggly high, or enjoy some 4-FA with me. 

i have begun to really enjoy the forums here it's one of the few places i can speak freely about drug use without constantly using SWIM or creative writing to deflect culpability.  everyone is very civil and lessons are learned from this ultimate experiment in a true free market.

*destiny*
Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: qvel on December 26, 2011, 07:00 pm
I'll bump this since I noticed my previously attempted edit to my previous post didn't go through (and since it seems like a good thread worth +1ing)

I came to SR to seek reliable sources of certain medicines and sacraments since my local market is interested more in a cheap high (usually with a low quality commercial grade product) than in serious introspection, or treatment of ailments.
top grade cannabis (particularly extracts), ibogaine, assorted (and especially exotic) phenethylamines and tryptamines, these are the things I came here to buy.

I have a notoriously high tolerance and dosage threshold level to pretty much everything I've ever tried, perhaps a quirk of my biology (I've discussed this with those of my ancestors who are still alive and can recall their own psychonautic journeys), but at any rate if something effects me, there is a good chance it will effect the average user more heavily.

I smoke the strongest smoke available daily.
I periodically explore the realm of entheogenic biochemistry.
I am a student of life eternal, and of the infinitely complex 'Verse, and of its Source should there be one.

Post by: SierraRS on December 30, 2011, 03:46 am
Probably a little bit too late for introduction post, but here it is:

I'm early member on Silk Road. Registered but did not made any purchases, mainly because there was many important things going IRL. The Silk Road did not shock me as I'm honored member of many amazing places, the Silk Road was just different. Almost too good to be true :D

I'm into computers and computer security. I can help other members with various questions in this topic, as well as physical security and so on. I have no formal education in this field, but self-learning and passionate interest is just as good.

My favorite drug is alcohol. From time to time I enjoy mary J with my friends or some track of amphetamine. Also I take phenobarbital prescription mixtures if I can get them, they feel almost exactly like being drunk. But nothing removes the pain from my life as getting drunk and passing out.
Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: chino on December 30, 2011, 04:39 am
After few years travelling here and there. I started the normal life on my "thirties". Now i got wife, kids a small bussiness. I really love heroin. I did use in the past heroin by fixing. I been hook on it in India and Thailand, Greece,  Israel, Egypt, and Turkey . I think heroin by the needle is super plesurable, the more hook you are, the more pleasure you get from it. I remember when i wake up in India my first fix of indian white h in the morning, the following ones of the day not epic . Now i am afraid to loose control if i fix it. So i smoke it now. I love to smoke h, browns preferieble, but if is good h white too. All my body gets better when i have good h. My cells got a memory efect that when i take it they get 150% happier. I am not a compulsive user, somepeople get a gram and until they dont finish they dont stop taking. I keep under control with very strict personal rules. Like never buy during the working days in the week. I smoke fridays, saturdays and Sundays. If i got abundance, during the week i will have a smoke at night when i came from work before dinner, if i dont have h i have some morphine. Codeine, make me scratch a lot. I never try oxys i dont know if they are more like morphine i hate bad quality heroin i had been 13 years looking for a good dealer with a good product and everything is garbige or a scramble of many different compaunds lace it with heroin . I like opioids, but morphine for me is too boring is not as pleasurable like heroin. I dont drink alcohol, i dont smoke grass or haschis anymore it make me paranoid. I dont take or like relaxing pills, or benzos.   I like to eat opium ocassionaly when i get it very rarerly lately. I colection books about drugs and drugs and pharmaceutical parafernalia. I am very very interested in trying dmt or ibogaine. I am looking for experiencing a psicodelic drug to do it now and them. I know i need some guidance, i will like to hear from and opioid user that is in methadone maintenance, that use dmt . Is been 15 years that i dont use l.s.d., maybe 14 that i dont use mmda or mda.  I am in a methadone maintennance know for 10 years know with a medium dose of 75mg/day. I hate the stigma associated with drug users. It piss me off a lot, that you can get benzos and tranquilizers prescribe so easy, Prozac, mixed with alcohol, and to get prescribe opioids  i been 10 years seeing a doctor 2 times a month. Signing every freaking day in the Pharmacy. Hiding so my neighbourgs dont see me everyday in the pharmacy drinking the stupid methadone (that by the way dont give me any pleasure) I found this place and i realize i was looking for it without knowing that existed. I think that is going to improve my live a lot. I hope so.   
Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: SuperDimitri on December 30, 2011, 05:32 am
I'm SuperDimitri. I was drawn here through RS article. Was very hesitant, and still kinda am. I have only placed 2 orders, over a week ago, and am still waiting on arrival.
I originally had high hopes of selling, but soon realized it wasn't going to be all humdrum, as it is at home, and so now have just been spending Xhours a day reading these goddamn forums. It really ISN'T my thing to have to read a lot, I prefer to be outside hiking, snowboarding, etc. I am currently getting all the gear together that would make me a trusted seller, i.e: a TON of thick mm plastic, a vacuum sealer, bindles, etc. I have been shipping herb, scoobs, dose, & dmt to my family in various states for years, but never took the care that I read about here.....AND....never experienced a single problem. Albeit, nothing that has to pass through customs. All intra-nation.
I someday hope to provide you with top quality indoor cannabis. Everyone brags about their weed,so I will just say top notch. At the time ofthis posting, the prevalent variety is the LemonSkunk/Haze that seems to be getting rave reviews on SR. Hash, when available. We have a nice bubble (bubble bag) hash right now. Ecuadorian scoobs, old school PF tek, then cased, and done indoors, or so I am told. And, of course, some super N, N-DMT. Extracted from MHRB using 99.9% pure NAOH, distilled water, & Naphtha. Re-crystalized, so there is a variety of quality, ranging from shard/fish scale, pure white, off-white, little yellow, yellow. From personal experience, yellow to shard is a one hit difference. Yellow is just not so mellow on the lungs.
I was also thinking of providing DMT materials, such as MHRB powder.
In the meantime, you may see me post some questions, comments, etc, whilst browsing the forums.
And my offer from my very 1st post still stands: Happy to trade a ball of DMT for BTC, or the purchase of a seller's account for me.
Until next time, keep your vibrations high, and maybe Santa will bring you what you want next December!
Peace,
SD

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Atticus on January 02, 2012, 11:43 pm
Hey everyone. :)

I've been aware of Silk Road for a couple of months and a member for about a month. I've so far only made one (small) purchase about three weeks ago which went really well and I plan to make my second in a few days.

Outside of the internet I have a few contacts for weed but at most I find myself getting about 1.5g of hydro for £20. I also can get really shit MDMA for £40 a gram and really really really bad cocaine for £30 a gram (as good a price as that is, the stuff is terrible so it's not worth my money.) I've got a dealer for LSD too but I've never tried him yet and it's £15 a tab which is bloody expensive. I could get ecstasy pills, heroin and shrooms if I asked around but I've never bothered. When I found out about Silk Road I was really high and it sounded like some underground resistance organisation in a book detailing a totalitarian future, the idea seemed really fucked up at the time though. As soon as I was sober I checked it out though and here I am.

I only started using drugs in the past year or two and I currently smoke weed a couple of times a week either with friends or myself and really enjoy it. I also occasionally use cocaine and MDMA. I've been experimenting with a lot of legal highs too recently some have been interesting, some not worked and one made me unable to achieve an erection when in bed with a really sexy blonde girl I'd only dreamed of before. (Fuck it, I'm anonymous, may as well share the moment when I really hated myself.  ;D) I'd like to start more on the real deal though and SR is my answer.

I hope to become quite a frequent poster on these forums as in the year or two I've been using drugs I've become somewhat of a drug-freak, reading pretty much every interesting thing about all sorts of drugs the internet has to offer. So hopefully I can help some people out. I will also consider selling some stuff on here in the near future; I never plan to do it myself but I can get some brilliant heroin around here. But that's just a maybe.

Looking forward to many positive experiences with SR in the future. :)
Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: BigFlake on January 03, 2012, 02:49 am
Hi everyone, I'm BigFlake.  Techie geek in the daytime.  I discovered SR through the Gawker article.  Coke is my drug of choice, although I'm open to experimentation.  Have been thinking of trying MDMA recently.

I used a lot of coke in the 80s when the popularity was at its height.  Then, due to funds and life circumstances, I stopped.  On vacation about a year ago, I scored a gram and the memories came back. 

Discovering SR opened up a new world for me and I'll never forget the first delivery I received.  I've done about 15 transactions through normal channels and several OOE although I'm probably curtailing that after one bad, costly, experience.  For the most part, the vendors I've dealt with have been great.  I appreciate them, and everyone behind SR. 

Glad to be here sharing this experience with all of you.  Long live SR!

BF
Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: mezzrow on January 03, 2012, 07:03 pm
   Howdy!  I am Mezzrow.  Brand spanking new to SR and i am already quite impressed.  It is so much more than a drugstore.  I especially appreciate the community vibe and all the info/ communication.  It feels like you are part of something with a (hopefully) shared vision.  For me, Community is where its at...and of course the LSD has me super stoked!
     I grew up on a farm and was home schooled (kind of a trip in itself), went to a religious university for under grads in Music, Lit, and Philosophy, and received a M.S. in Rural Sociology from a big state school.  Never made a dime from any of that (though looking back, I don't think that was ever really my intention).  I have done some advocacy work, run a local political campaign, and done a lot of volunteer work, but most of my working life so far (15 -20 yr.) has been involved in climbing.  Cell towers, radio towers, T.V., wind turbines,  the works.  And rock...lotsa rock climbing, surfing, longboarding, backpacking...fun outdoors stuff.  And best of all (and I mean this with utmost seriousness) I am a dad.  My son is about 18 mos. and is the best thing that ever happened to me (right up there with Buddha and LSD).  Speaking of him...I think I have to cut this short.  More to come...
-Selah

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: psychedelicbees1 on January 05, 2012, 08:09 pm
Howdy SR,
I'm psychedelicbees and i love psychedelics!  I came here one day when I was bored and decided to search "drugs" on google.  Lo and behold, Gawker came up with an article about here so i figured I'd check it out.  After spending a week or so looking I decided to take the plunge and order some legal RCs first.  When they came, I almost shit myself with happiness!  This place was real and I wasn't just dreaming.  Oh boy I went crazy that first month, ordering every psychedelic i could.  Then my local acid source up and vanished so i figured "fuck it, let's order the real thing".  I went to Mitanox and haven't even bothered finding a local guy.  I'm an aspiring chemist and neuropharmacist, hoping one day to continue the work of Dr. Shulgin.  Recently i picked up PiHKAL and TiHKAL.... one day I will have a check mark next to everyone of those lovely compounds.  Another reason I love drugs so much is because it is the only way i feel I can actively protest the government's ridiculous want to control our lives.  Not only can drugs expand our minds and knowledge of ourselves, but the black market can be used for good and prevent the governement from getting more money!

Much love,
PB

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: NeveWitch on January 07, 2012, 12:10 am
Finally wandered into the Off topic section and found this thread!

I'm NW, and I've been active on SR for a little over a month now. Like a lot of the newer members, Gawker introduced me to Tor and SR, and while I was interested back then, I figured there was way too much heat surrounding SR so I avoided signing up and forgot about it until a few months ago. My friends and I were looking to try shrooms but could not find any hooks, then I remembered about SR. I lurked and studied the forums and the marketplace, and eventually mustered the courage to make my first purchase, which actually ended up being domestic MDMA and not shrooms (though that was my second order).

I believe there is no harm in dabbling, and that some drugs are unreasonably demonized. I have done pot, MDMA, and shrooms, and looking forward to trying LSD in the near future. Beyond those listed, that's about as far I am willing to tread.

I am very glad a place like this exists, and I hope SR stays around for a long time.

Good morning!
I am the goatHerd. I heard my flock of thoughts to and fro across the stony meadows of the mind. The grass they graze and the grass I smoke puts us all at ease so that we may live in peace. I try to take advantage of the vantage that the distance of the meadow offers.

I'm very excited toward the growing presence of Silk Road. It represents everything I think the internet should be. What we have here is a measure of freedom granted us by our peers to live as we will and follow our bliss. I cherish that freedom.

Thank you for helping maintain this bastion of sanity. I'm glad to be a part of this community. I aim to aid in making this community great.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: DudeRugs on January 17, 2012, 12:12 am
Hello all. DudeRugs reporting in..  you may also call me "the dude" or just "dude". I have been something of a psychonaut for the better part of 15 years and from my years of experience I have made many good-to-know connects and have positioned myself in a manner that allows me to get a wide array of wonderful mind-altering substances and very reasonable prices. Upon discovering the SR I realized that it was possible for this community to benefit from me, just as much I as I am able to benefit from the community. I have done every psychedelic that I have ever been able to obtain and currently have found amazing potential in a compound known as 25i-NBOMe. Anyone who enjoys LSD and/or MDMA I would encourage to try this amazing new psychedelic. I consider myself more of a traditional type drug user, in the sense that I am not overly interested in all of these different RCs that constantly come out. But 25i is one that really stands out. It feels very natural like mushrooms do, while giving the complexity of an LSD trip, but with the depth that you would expect from an intense mescaline journey, or even a DMT trip. I am happy to be able to offer this wonderful substance to this community for prices that are well below any other vendor. Obviously, should you want to try this amazing drug feel free to check out my listings or PM me for info but this isn't a sales pitch.. should you have the chance to try it I implore you to, whether I am the one supplying it or not.

Sorry for the rant, I have just been having a great time since discovering the NBOMe's. I also will be having various pills available for prices below all the competitors. I am not trying to start price wars and frankly it won't happen since with pills, supply is typically limited per month to the size of the prescription. Should you feel like checking my sellers page though, I have many prices listed for different pills that I come into possession of throughout the month. At the prices I list they do go somewhat quick, but I am happy to make them available for the prices that I list them at.

Other than that, I am just happy to get to be a part of a place I believe to be revolutionary for the drug culture. SR is a convergence of technology, intelligent people, and what I feel is an instinctual pursuit of people merely trying to find a way to get the things they want to make them content and without harming ANYONE in the process. I feel as if LEOs really have no place here because due to the nature of the marketplace, there is zero possibility of violence, intimidation, or aggression. Gotta love the internet..

Yo,im Max1259 on here and Macca1259  on SilkRoad,don't know why i have 2 names,guess iv just always been an awkard twat,well so my girlfriend says,she actually calls me a lot more but im not hiring a hitman yet,PM if there's any out there though  :D
Lucky enough to have been around here for at least 6 months and loved every minute of it,interesting chats,met some cool dudes and even though in my 34 years iv tried most drugs out there this place has enabled me to try a few more lol  ;D And especially having always wanted to have some 'PROPER' Coke iv eventually been getting it from here instead of the 8% pure shitte that passes for Charlie in the UK-God bless SR for eventualy letting me get decent stuff.
And also it's a first for mevgetting H that i dont have to add citric to it.
Always been an experimental guy with mind altering substances,was there when the original E's hit the UK late 80's early 90's,was picking shrooms before that,for 8 years i had a blast trying,taking,selling just about everything and was lucky enough not to get stung,so thank God or whoever.
My only gripe at present is this pressure to finalize early,the most respected buyers dont ask so that's good and the thing is if iv ordered before and im happy then i will finalize early as a thank you,just dont like it as 'If you don't like,go somewhere else,you HAVE TO DO IT '
Also wish i could get a cut price buyers account lol,just for the little guys lol.
Peace

Hello, My name is not Will, but we will go with that for the moment.  I am brand new to SR. But how I do love that there is a site, that let's individuals decide what they can buy, without any restrictions.  I applied for the customer service job fingers crossed, so I can quit my shitty pharmacy job.  But until then I do have access to Sudafed...well the generic version so the same thing.  I have seen someone selling a small amount for a large sum which is ridiculous.  I have seen some digital stuff I would like to buy that hopefully will build up my credit around here, and then I might start selling, since I do get a wicked discount.  Also, if you look gross, most pharmacies hid the sudafed and just lie to the junkies that come in there. Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: hillis4070 on January 30, 2012, 08:08 pm
Hey, I'm hillis4070 and I heard about this site a few weeks ago and today found an article talking about how to get on it, so I decided to do so.  I have a fairly limited understanding of security issues like encryption and using tor but I assume I'll learn as I go.

I've actually never been a huge drug person; I was paranoid as hell about using anything illegal (other than underage drinking) growing up because of my extremely religious parents.  Tried pot once, and it didn't seem to have any effect.  E wasn't around yet (during my high school/college days, anyway) and I didn't know anyone doing anything stronger than pot or the occasional tab of acid or mushrooms, so I basically just shrugged and got plastered instead of experimenting with anything harder.

Fast forward to now, and I'm a chronic pain patient, with unrelenting muscular pain of indeterminate origin throughout my back and hips, as well as frequent migraine type headaches.  I don't live in a medical MJ state, and I've been increasingly wondering if it might make some difference in my pain.  Of course I don't know any one locally who uses, let alone deals, and suddenly an anonymous internet drug market seems like a pretty solid thing to me.

I'm going to spend some time researching various MJ strains specifically for pain benefits before I take the plunge and buy anything, and potentially look into backing up my opiate supply (since my doctor doesn't give me more than 30 Percoset at a time, I often find myself rationing them and not taking one despite being in a lot of pain).  I'm on Tramadol daily, but if MJ could do the job I'd rather use something natural like that then a synthetic opiate agonist for daily pain control.

Any tips or suggestions are greatly appreciated.

Best of luck to one and all. 
Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: D@rk_St@r on January 30, 2012, 11:40 pm
I'm just your typical computer nerd and family man that likes to be able to let go of reality for a few hours every now and then. I found the road after moving to a new state I got tired of having to go though multiple people just to find one thing and then dealing with the markup it always gets. It is also nice to find things that I can't get a hold of easily and usually comes with a stiff price. While I've mostly just been in it for the Molly and L, I must say with the weather changing and more chances to get out camping, I can't wait to get some shroomies which I swear has been like 4 years since I've even heard of a guy that knows a guy who's third cousin works with a guy that MIGHT have some... Just a quick thanks to all those that help keep this site and forums up and running.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: spacewasp on January 31, 2012, 01:25 am
yo

I'm a wasp from outer space.  i walk the road between worlds.  I'm generally a good spirit, but I sting hard when provoked.  I suppose, if pressed, I'd have to say I'm a neutral observer in this world.  In the spirit world, however, I'm a captain in the army of light, and trust me.....light is going to prevail over dark!

Been looking for this place for a while; glad to finally be here.  If you wire yourself into the net firmly enough, you can find anything :D

I need weed: without it, I get hardened, dull, and unpleasant.  this place is such a blessing, because as I've gotten older my local connections for herb have faded to almost nothing.  I also have always found it awkward to go to some guy's house and try to figure out how long is appropriate to stay and chat before I can leave.  And I don't have a car, so I used to have my girlfriend drive me to the weed-man's house making the situation even MORE awkward.  I'm so glad that silk road has made those concerns a thing of the past

I've done a lot of psychedelics in my day.  my thoughts and experiences on getting the most out of tripping: 
So, our brains are a LOT like computers and there is indeed an internet for brains.  When you use a high intensity/short acting psychedelic like DMT or Salvia extract its a bit like downloading a compressed file from the net: you can get a whole lot of info in a short amount of time BUT you have to decompress the file.  to decompress a Salvia or DMT trip, you need acid.  LSD is, hands-down, the best program I've come across for this function.  actually, i think acid is only good for deprogramming and decompressing...for anything else its basically useless.  So, here's what you do to learn the secrets of life and the universe:

1) Smoke a high intensity psychedelic
2) chill out for a week
3) clean your house/apartment/flat/whatever.
4) take a moderate to heavy dose of LSD in your home alone or with 1-3 other people.  It doesn't hurt to have some MDMA on hand in case your trip turns ugly.  (note:  NEVER take mdma first...ALWAYS take the acid first)
5) sit or lay somewhere comfortable and try to spend the trip thinking about your high intensity psychedelic experience.
6) bask in the grand mysteries of life, humanity, and the universe as they are revealed unto you.


I very rarely use psychedelics anymore, however.  Towards the end of my heavy usage I started to really lose it, mentally.  I thought I had "learned too much" or had "gone too far" but I'm learning now that I was a tad bit reckless and somehow let some evil djinn/demon/spirit/whatever into my headspace.  I've done a lot of work in the last few years toughening up my psyche, though, so now my astral avatar has transformed into a raging maniacal warrior.  No one would believe how I accomplished this, and in truth I'd be a little embarrassed to talk about it on a public forum, but PM me if you need help in this area and I'll share my secret with you.

currently my favorite shit is doing a bunch of K while rolling on MDMA.  I get wicked spaced out and can basically do whatever the hell I want:  my imagination literally comes to life.  I'm thinking about getting back into the psychedelics, though...kinda feeling the urge to trip out on a quarter of shrooms.

so yeah, i've been rambling, but this is kind of a stupid thread to exist on a forum like this.
good to be here.  much love to you all.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: penagihdadah on February 01, 2012, 01:52 pm
Hi All

My name is penagihdadah from Malaysia. 'penagihdadah' means "junkie" in the native language here. Im an animator/visual effects artist with a degree in film and animation. I prefer hallucinogens and my first drug was a self-extracted DMT (acacia confusa trees grows EVERYWHERE here lol). Im also a cannabis and acid aficionado.  I came to know SR and tor in general via the notorious 4chan.

Being involved in drugs in Malaysia is kinda sucky cos the tolerance here is extremely low. Its quite common to read news bout drug busts every week around here (mostly involves opiates, weed, MDMA and meth). Even carrying 200gm of weed cud get u a capital punishment by hanging, altho the LE here is equally corrupt if u have the connections and money. Weed is the most popular drug here, and usually involve foreigner cartels from the Middle East and Africa. Despite all that, classic hallucinogens like LSD, Psilocybin, Mescaline and DMT are almost unheard of in the media.

Pleasure to meet you all. Keep up the good fight!

If we all keep our wits about us and keep open these important lines of communication we can dodge the LEO's that don't know what the non-aggression principle is, and usurp the scammers that seem to have been having a field day as of late. Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: John Humphreys on February 03, 2012, 03:20 pm
I know the original author asked for no real information, but my intention is to not be anonymous so as to increase credibility, and the flip side being of course that I'm not going to be buying or selling any drugs. I hope that is OK.

My name is John Humphreys, a 33 year old guy from Brisbane, Australia. My CV and more information that you want is available at my website: www.johnhumphreys.com.au

I'm currently doing my economics PhD at the University of Queensland, looking at non-profit personal personal equity financing of University in Cambodia. Basically, my thesis is about the Human Capital Project (www.humancapitalproject.com.au) which I set up back in 2007.

As part of my thesis I will be looking at emergent market institutions... which basically means I'll be looking at why people respect private property and contracts, even when there is nobody to enforce the rules. Obviously, this is very relevant for SR since there is no government here, and yet the market exists and seems to be growing.

So I intend to be running around the SR world looking for useable data on how effective this non-government market system is working. At some point I hope to conduct a survey of buyers and sellers asking about your experiences. If I'm lucky, I might also get funding to run some experiments on SR, where I'll pay you to play some (fully legal) games.

If anybody knows of any other similar research that has been done about Silk Road, I would love to hear about it. You can message me here, or e-mail me directly on john.humphreys99@gmail.com. Suffice to say, all individual correspondence will be kept in strict confidence (which is a requirement of my research)... and you're still anonymous so you're safe anyway.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: CocaCola on February 05, 2012, 09:47 pm
Hey Silk Road!

As a total noob to SR, I have a funny story as to how I found this place in the first place.

I did not discover SR from the Gawker article, or the Senator Schumer outrage. I only learned that after I got here and did research.

No, I got here completely by accident. I Googled "Silk Road" because I was working on a history assignment  and doing research on the ancient trade link between Rome and China so I hit the Wikipedia link. Then I hit the "disambiguation" link and stumbled upon this awesome market place.

True story!

Three weeks later, I'm hooked and about to make my first purchase.

I believe in total freedom and adherence to the "Golden Rule"; that ancient Greek idea going back to 500BC.

"Do nothing to others that you would not like done to you."

That should be the only basis for all law. As long as I do nothing to harm others, the "law" should have no business in my affairs. That is the very essence of individual freedom.

The idea that "the authorities" can say what you can and what you cannot do with your own body is absurd. It is not the mark of a truly 'free society'. If I hurt nobody (except myself) by imbibing substances deemed illegal then surely true freedom exists in my ability to make that choice for myself. Unfortunately, we live in a "locked down world", a true sci fi dystopia, where the organs of the state deny us that ability through Draconian laws and seek to control our own choices in how we choose to live our lives.

This is not freedom by any metric.

 In fact, the current world reality is that we are living in the opposite of a free society; in fact, a rigid slavery.

If I cannot choose what I want to do with my own body and I hurt nobody except myself in the process and, take full responsibility for the choices I make, then I am not free.

Some argue that using illicit substances is detrimental to society due to "collateral damage". That is, idiots ending up in Emergency Rooms due to over doses and the idea that illegal substances lead to that more readily. I refute that argument just by casually looking at ER statistics and their admission rates. 60% of Emergency Room admissions on any given night are alcohol related, either through drunk drivers, domestic violence or overdose and that is a "legal drug".

The US Drug War has turned Mexico into a 'failed state' on its southern border and resulted in the US having a greater prison population than Stalinist Russia and the highest number of citizens jailed for non violent crimes than at any time in the history of civilization.


Silk Road, from my perspective, is a great "fuck you" to those who seek to control us.

I see Silk Road and the dark net in general as a means to circumvent the rules the stupid masses have imposed on the few who dare to dream.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Notshadow on February 06, 2012, 07:36 am
Hey guys!

I'm NotShadow. I've been with SR since near infancy.. Myself, as well as one of my other friends were in search of a reliable source for drugs, and the more we thought about it the more we thought to the internet..And like God himself was providing the answer, I came across a few forums with the mention of "the Road" and the like. I had already known what the Onion was (I used it to bypass school filtering as a kid, but never imagined this purpose. Man if I could've came up with the idea I'd be rich!

Anyways, I'm an avid drug user and have tried most. They all sink my submarine for the most part:) I also have a lot of interest in computers, programming, organic chemistry, computer security and encryption, counterfeiting..Just about most subjects interest me:) I recently made it off probation, and can now smoke my MJ again, which is by far my drug of choice (maybe a tie with Methoxetamine). I also LOVE LOVE LOVE psychedelics, and AMAZING coke. and MDMA:) I've never tried pure Methamphetamine, but every other form I have. It is a goal of mine to try it at least once. Currently its my personal goal to find an amazing MDMA substitute, and an Oxy substitute (I also <3 me some Research Chems) :)

I was once a new comer here and the community we have taught me very well:) So glad I found this community, it is simply amazing! Keep up the good work guys, we are the reason SR is still going!

If I can help out, let me know! There a few situations I haven't been in, or seen on the SR so I can be helpful I'm sure:)

-NS

SR IS THE SHIT!

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: lizardking561 on February 09, 2012, 03:42 am
Quote from: The Romantic Era on February 09, 2012, 02:14 am
Quote from: lizardking561 on February 08, 2012, 07:00 pm
Hey guys, I'm Lizardking561 and I am very glad to join this unique online community. From browsing around so far, this seems like the website I wish was around when I was in high school. A little bit about me: I love music and play bass and that is my main passion in life. I am just starting at a new school after a little time off. I am quite excited to get back to school because my next greatest passion would have to be learning. That's enough from me, I'm just really excited to join what I'm sure is an awesome community.

props on the bass, man. i just picked one up and am trying to teach myself :P drugs are really 'helping' in my 'exploration' of its sound, haha. just wondering, but do you like the bass licks in some of radiohead's shit? some of em are so great :D

I couldn't agree with you more, especially on the drugs helping you explore it's sound, it makes doing drugs even better lol. Radiohead is just all around amazing and some of those bass lines will get stuck in your head for days. Some advice: if you are trying to teach yourself, definitely get some books. There's tons of them out there. Any books by Hal Leonard are always quality. My first bass book was bass guitar for dummies and believe it or not it gave me a pretty good foundation to understanding the instrument. If you can afford it get a teacher because my skills and understanding really took off once I started lessons. There's also tons of lessons on youtube. But stick with it even when it seems you aren't progressing, practice, practice, practice. I know that's cliche, but it's true. The world needs more bassists. And if you are trying to teach yourself there's a lot of information on the web. Try talkbass.com, but that might be a little overwhelming without a foundation of musical knowledge. Seriously, get a beginner's bass book and practice your ass off.  I'm not the greatest bassist in the world, but I've found so much joy in playing I would love to help spark a passion for bass in someone else. Rock on man and I hope you find as much joy in the instrument as I have.

Check out the bass line from quarantined by At the Drive In. I had my ipod on shuffle today and that song came on and I totally forgot how awesome that bass line is. And it's not very hard to learn once you get the timing down. Some more bass lines that are fun to play: Chic- Good Times, Arctic monkeys- florescent adolescent, Marvin Gaye- What's goin' on, Beatles- A day in the life, Muse- Hysteria, Sublime- Santeria. Just to name a few. Happy jamming.  ;D

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: nevesurOMA on February 13, 2012, 11:04 pm
Quote from: CocaCola on February 05, 2012, 09:47 pm


Some argue that using illicit substances is detrimental to society due to "collateral damage". That is, idiots ending up in Emergency Rooms due to over doses and the idea that illegal substances lead to that more readily. I refute that argument just by casually looking at ER statistics and their admission rates. 60% of Emergency Room admissions on any given night are alcohol related, either through drunk drivers, domestic violence or overdose and that is a "legal drug".

The US Drug War has turned Mexico into a 'failed state' on its southern border and resulted in the US having a greater prison population than Stalinist Russia and the highest number of citizens jailed for non violent crimes than at any time in the history of civilization.


Silk Road, from my perspective, is a great "fuck you" to those who seek to control us.


fuck yeah!

Title: New to Silk Road
Post by: msween27 on February 21, 2012, 03:38 am
Just posting to introduce myself to the community.  I am a fan of all kinds of different mind-altering chemicals.  I am tired of dealing with shady dealers who offer only a limited variety of products (usually only crack or heroin).  I've spent many hours studying up on pgp, bitcoins and the SR ordering processes.  I think I have a good grasp on it now.  I'm looking for my first purchase of ketamine and was wondering if anyone could refer me to a reputable dealer that will sell to a first time buyer.

Title: Re: New to Silk Road
Post by: ron1n on February 21, 2012, 05:16 am
Almost everyone would sell to a first-timer unless they otherwise say so in their listing/profile.  The only downside is that a lot of vendors make you finalize before they ship if you are new, so make sure you pick reputable vendors.  What country are you located in?  I find it best to order domestically (from within the same country).  I'm from the USA, but i'll also order from Canada.  If you are comfortable ordering from Canada I would recommend looking up the vendor Tony76 in the search function within the main website.  You can also browse his reviews here in the forums by searching him out as well.  He sells all of the drugs I use and I (nor anyone else i've ever seen) have had problems with him or the quality of his products.
Title: Re: New to Silk Road
Post by: FiveSeven on February 21, 2012, 09:58 am
Best bet to research a vender is to simply search their name on the forums and you should get a bunch of threads. Be wary of ordering from people who don't seem to have any feedback. Also there are some drug specific threads where people discuss quality which might be worth a read (not sure if there is a K one off the top of my head but worth a look).

Hello! My user name reflects my geographical location, demeanor, and intent on SR.

F2F and internet businesses, I do both. SR is a nice balance of the two.

I can vet a connection with anonymity and don't have to worry about my personal safety compared with attempting this activity in my said city.

I have never done an illicit drug in my life. Suffer from intense migraines, so I was prescribed hydrocone once. It felt nice, but it didn't really "eliminate" the pain so I saw it as a waste.

However, I like to see other people happy and they usually are happiest, at some point and time, while they are on a chemical substance. I don't judge them, they don't judge me, and we get along great.

I am looking to learn as much as I can about drugs, business, and the business of drugs while I am here.

Basically, like one other forum I frequent daily on the WWW, I just picked up another "family"!

Hey everybody--

Greetings everyone! my name is Rockstafarian, I've been on silk road for just a few weeks now and I'm starting to really like this market and the community / discussions here on the forum. I really enjoy opiates, especially opium because it mixes so well with weed but I have done many others. LSD is probably my favorite drug but as many of you know using a lot of LSD can be kinda difficult to manage so after about 40 trips and a few intense psychedelic experiences that flung me to the edges of my own mind in the past 2 years I've slowed down on that... for a little while at least lol
I am very interested in all the different drugs and have spend many hours on Erowid researching and learning as much as possible, my friends usually go to me if they have questions about the safe way of doing a drug. I'm all about doing drugs, but being responsible and maintaining a harm-reduction mentality
I am creatively wired, and I try to watch out for people as best as I can. I despise the control that governments have on us people and I love the people at SR for creating such a place. Thanks to everyone here at Silk Road for making and maintaining this place, I hope that it continues for a long time so that we can continue to live freely without governments to tell us what we can and can't do with our bodies!

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)

I also dabble in cryptography and i love Tor and Bitcoins, and so naturally I gravitated to the great and notorious Silk road.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: fatespossession on March 05, 2012, 08:11 am
Hello all, I'm fatespossession and I'll be placing my first order within the week. Been browsing the site for a couple months now, and my cautious nature had prevented me from making any orders, but now I've decided to man the fuck up and purchase some quality shit.

Sadly, where I'm located, you'd be hard pressed to find any drug that could be considered worth a shit. Even if you find a bean from someone around here, you'll be lucky to have even a trace of piperazines in the bean and to expect any hint of MDMA would be laughable. The drugs are few and far between, and when you find them the quality is complete garbage, so you can imagine the allure of SR.

To sum myself up, I am a man who believes in the saying "work hard, play hard, in that order". I go throughout my day busting my ass in every endeavor I partake in, but when I get home I want to turn the productivity off and enjoy the euphoria of some pure, clean drugs. I plan to start with small personal doses of MDMA and Crystal Methylone, moving towards larger orders of the two and random small buys as I look to experience the drugs I have never been able to get my hands on. Looking forward to doing business with and meeting some well-educated drug users.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: doothewop on March 07, 2012, 02:24 am
Greetings all!

  I'm Doo, I'm a bitcoin miner and a chef and a thoroughbred handicapper and a writer
and an enthusiastic user of various illicit substances.  I found this place through the
Wired article, actually on the same day my brother mentioned to me there was a site
where you could buy weed anonymously.  While I am a bit skeptical of buying something
that stinks as much as good weed does through the mail, I have made a few purchases
over other kinds.  Not received any of it yet, but it's only been a day or two.  I am
not an impatient guy.  Also, I am not imprudent, so all the sellers I purchased from are
in the top 10.  I don't anticipate any problems.

  What I don't understand is the insistence on the part of some sellers on FE.
Specifically what I don't understand is what difference it makes in the long run
whether I finalize early or not.  By my count, the seller had sold thousands ($)
worth of product on the 3 days around my purchase.  So I assume that s/he
didn't particularly need my $30 to reup.  I understand, I have 0 purchases, you
don't know me from Adam West.  But I just don't really see what the risk is
on the part of the seller to use the system as it was intended to be used.  In
fact, it seems a tad disingenuous to insist that new users go about their first
purchase(s) in the exact way that everyone on the forum says you shouldn't.
It lends an air of disunity to the whole thing.

Am I missing something?  If the package is intercepted, the risk falls on me, as
it's my name(ish) on the package.  In fact, it seems that all the risk is being
taken by me once the package is in the system.  Barring fingerprints being
found or the contents of the package being somehow traceable.  But a good,
top 10 seller wouldn't be stupid enough to leave any identifying marks on or
in the package.  I could just not get my product, then I'm fucked.  I could get
arrested, then I'm fucked.  I don't see how finalizing early is in any way beneficial.
If I didn't have the funds, then I would not have been able to make the purchase
in the first place, but it seems like I have to prove myself or something.  At the
expense of the excellent escrow system.

 So I guess my question is what benefit is it to the seller for me to FE?
And I mean a top vendor, who doesn't, in fact, actually need my money
in order to keep his business afloat.  I certainly wouldn't just hand a street
dealer $20 and trust him to meet me later on, which is what this practice reeks
of.  I have my money, you have the product, or no sale.  Really, I wouldn't buy
from a street dealer anyway.  Which brings me here.

  I do actually hope to become a seller at some point, I am ecstatic that this
place exists and flourishes.  I've long suspected that something like this had
to exist, and I'm glad it does.

  I look forward to getting to know all of you.

dtw

Hi my name is German Kraut im 35 years and i come from Germany  LOL  :)
I fuckin Love Drugs.My dream came true - Silk Road was born - The best shop in the world.
I hope the SR server never gets down.
For me Silk Road is a lifetime membership - I buy and sell drugs until i die or Silk Road dies (i hope never).
I have the opinion that everybody can do with his body  what he or she wants to do (using drugs).
The best thing to keep Silk Road still alive and secure is learn how TOR, PGP Encryption and Bitcoin
work, so you understand how to use them and where their limitations are.
I found a nice guide how to use Silk Road:   http://www.gwern.net/Silk%20Road
I would do all to help, protect and support Silk Road.

Best regards  German Kraut

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: risky2 on March 12, 2012, 06:41 pm
Heh, ('heh' is a word  I use for a little chuckle if anyone was wondering what the hell 'heh' means) I've never introduced myself in forums before. So might as well start now,

Hi, I'm risky and I'm a alco... oh wait wrong intro, bad joke I know, lol. Umm been a SR member for 7 months, and a noob to forums. I used to  do a lot of drugs in  my late teens and  early 20's back in the  late 80's & early 90's. Yes, i'm about early 40s if you do the math. I used to be a roadie for some small local death metal bands ( back when death metal was at its peak and I had long hair, I keep it short now) in midwest US, and I have experience in painting and drawing, I currently work as a office drone for record stuff.

 I did free lance artwork for some local tattoo parlors, Just designs not actually tattooing. Funny thing is I never got a tatt! Clean pasty white skin all the way around. I'm kinda indecisive when it comes to permanent personal art. But I own a bunch of leather jackets with painted metal designs on the outside, I used to freelance in leather designs too. Haven't done any designs in years. I tell ya,  a couple places you can find drugs are Heavy metal concerts and tattoo parlors that's for sure! There you don't have to look for the dealers, they look for you! Like a soviet russia meme joke lol.

So I used to do all kinds of nasty street drugs like  smoking ghetto pcp( god I was dumb then), LSD ( I used to deal blotter in RL a couple of times ,and I sucked as one), shrooms, cut to hell coke( :::shiver:::), and homemade ( by dealers, not me. It was like Trucker's Speed) speed. Somehow made it alive without a police record or OD. Dumb luck and a little caution to help. Weed was mostly cheap indica stuff back then. I kinda prefer sativa weed nowadays. I'm a casual on and off again kinda user that just hangs with a few using friends from the past. No big parties or concerts really for me anymore. I keep to a small social circlce of friends and relatives. No wife, no kids,... so look out ladies.. .:::coughs::: Hmm, the forums aren't exactly an online dating hookup for drug users, are they ?    "I like to walk along...... BIG rails on a mirror with a rolled up bill and.... ahh...forget it."  " But Officer, I thought you were my online date, and a blonde lady with supermodel looks, please don't bust me for possession!"

I haven't told my friends yet that I get my stuff from the SR and the internet. They just think I got some good IRL hookups, heh. Think I'll tell em one day to blow to their minds while they are high. So that is about me in a nutshell. Like that old austin powers joke," No, This is me in a nutshell. Help, get me out, I'm trapped in a nutshell!"

Post by: Mithradates VI on March 20, 2012, 08:16 am
Hey all.  I thought of this nickname on the spot,  Mithradates VI was an old Persian king who was an enemy of the Roman republic.  In order to build up a tolerance against poison he regularly took small doses to build up his immunity!  :o  At the point where he was finally defeated he tried to kill himself with poison and was unable to!  :P

Im not exactly sure why it came to my head but it seems at least somewhat relevant.

Haven't done any business here yet, not sure if I will.  I remember getting live Peyote and Philosopher Stone Truffels from eBay in the early days! lol  Now days Im much more low key.  I still have a fondness for growing mushrooms, which I havent done in years.  I am in a medical friendly area and hope to get a medical card someday.  (oww, my back!)

I mine bit coins for money mostly.  I have an array of video cards humming next to me.  I'm real interested in new FPGA hardware and am anxiously awaiting my butterfly single.

I suppose that is enough to say about myself!

(PS, been enjoying reading many posts in these forums)

Post by: thisisme on April 03, 2012, 04:12 am
hello SR vendors and lurkers. Ive been a long time lurker here on SR and forums.  I just recently acquired some btc and just recently had the need to order from here.  Ive noticed various changes since i started lurking.   The one thing i noticed lately is the troublesome buyers on SR.  I figured make a post here, get myself established here on the forums.  a bonus, is If a vendor decides to scam me, i may seem a bit more believable.  But im not too concerned abut that.

Title: Re: New buyer here.. :)
Post by: simplyanon on April 03, 2012, 10:00 am
Quote from: thisisme on April 03, 2012, 04:12 am
hello SR vendors and lurkers. Ive been a long time lurker here on SR and forums.  I just recently acquired some btc and just recently had the need to order from here.  Ive noticed various changes since i started lurking.   The one thing i noticed lately is the troublesome buyers on SR.  I figured make a post here, get myself established here on the forums.  a bonus, is If a vendor decides to scam me, i may seem a bit more believable.  But im not too concerned abut that.

Ive looked into various vendors, quite reputable. Excited about making a buy fairly soon, maybe find a sample or 2. I came a bit late i noticed,  lack of opanas :(

Only thing ive yet to play with is pgp.  Ill probably use privnote if the vendor of my choice allows me.

PgP is simple, my friend. it truly is. Theres a wonderful tutorial right here on the forums that guided me step by step through the process. It's much more secure than privnote. And if you read the thread, most questions you could possibly have are already answered. :D

http://dkn255hz262ypmii.onion/index.php?topic=131.0 <- Tutorial.

Also, BEFORE you buy, I suggest checking out the Rumor Mill. Ive been here 3 days, and placed 3 orders with separate buyers. I am not the least bit concerned, thanks to uniwiz's thread on cannabis vendors. Research before you buy. Don't buy more than you can afford to lose. Stuff I'm sure you know already, but I figure its all worth restating.

Have a great day!

Title: An intro and a gripe
Post by: hatedpatriot on April 04, 2012, 11:15 pm
Wussup people? Not sure how active I'll be here, but I'll be poking around a little. I am a hated patriot because I love the American people, like our forefathers did, but hate the tyranny and oppression that has come to define our elected officials. I am therefore hated by my government, but I'm okay with that, I actually cope quite well. Anyway, glad this place is still kickin'. I used to be a seller on SR but after my first three sales every single person claimed to not receive their goods. It was my opinion that further throwing away of my product would be stupid, so I discontinued all involvement with SR. I'm back to take advantage of my options as a consumer and not a vendor. You people who order shit and then say you didn't get it should fuck off and die. It's bad enough that we have to hide in order to do business, now you fucking thieves are fucking that up as well.

Anyway, I gotta lot of catching up to do.
Title: Re: An intro and a gripe
Post by: Regicide on April 05, 2012, 12:35 am
Welcome back!

Sorry to hear you got screwed by punk ass scammers  :( Instead of not selling to and blacklisting scammers.. How about we send them adulterated shit that seriously injures them  :P It's not like they don't deserve getting a random mix of potent RCs instead of whatever they ordered.

If you change your mind and want to sell again though, using a DCN can greatly help in claiming the money that you did in fact earn.

I move alot, so I'm always without a steady source. That's the reason why I figured signing up here would be worthwhile. It gives me some shot at picking out the scammers. Lol, it's kinda mean, but I wish I woulda known those people were gonna screw me before I sent their stuff, I woulda definitely dosed that shit up with some 2c-i

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: twilight_sparkle on April 05, 2012, 03:50 pm
I’m Twilight Sparkle. I am not into new age stuff - the name comes from My Little Pony.
I was introduced to SR by my husband who (among other great things) is an IT geek + an anarchist.
I started taking hard drugs around the age of 20. I am happy that I started relatively late. Though loving drugs completely and utterly I think I have always managed to keep an OK balance between the party and the “serious life”.
I was a part of the rave movement from early/mid 1990s and on. I have had different phases in my life with drugs: in the beginning it was mostly LSD, then there was a period with speed, and finally it was mainly ecstasy (usually in combination with speed).  Weed has been a returning companion.
Today I am a mother and live a seemingly straight and busy life with a great job and lots of responsibilities. Needless to say my playing around with drugs has become a super controlled activity. I use them with my friends when I have a night away from the family, in very strict amounts. Occasionally we might go away to Berlin for a weekend to party. I take only ecstasy / mdma now (and smoke weed) - these two drugs are king to me.
I have been on SR for about a month, made a couple of purchases so far: ecstasy pills, which are impossible for me to find here (can only get mdma).
It makes me so DEEPLY happy to be here, together with such a wide range of personalities – all so different, however sharing our common interest in liberty and drugs. It gives me hope for the future, and I love all of you.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: LaNuit on April 11, 2012, 03:18 am
hello to my fellow travelers on the Silk Road!  I've been on SR for 2 months now, and though I don't post much I do like to read a lot of the message threads. I have been quite impressed with many, many of the community members here--intelligent, dedicated, creative people abound!

I am a lover of pretty much all drugs: uppers, downers, screamers, laughers, etc. etc.  I'm also an attorney in the USA, and a guitar player in my spare time. 

I'm definitely not a veteran around here, but for any total newbies, one thing I have learned the hard way on SR: Don't finalize early!! Or rather, only do it if the seller has a stellar reputation, BOTH on their mainpage feedback and on the message board review threads. Otherwise, don't do it! You lose any protection against scam sellers (who are unfortunately too common) and against mistakes.

Hope all are well!  ...except for lurking law enforcement, of course, to whom I say FUCK THE POLICE!
cheers,
La Nuit

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: maxxi on April 16, 2012, 12:37 am
Hi everyone,

I'm a student studying computer science in the UK and have been learning about drugs, their effects on the body and how they work since late 2010! I'm the go-to-guy for drug related questions in my friend circles, I feel that knowing the substance of your choice like the back of your hand is the way to go.

My path in to the world of illicit substances started in 2009 where a small group of friends and I hotboxed a tent. First time getting high was the best experience I've ever had to date! I then moved on to nitrous oxide which quickly became an all time favourite, I even sold it at my school for a while! Since then I've tried salvia (hell of a trip), 2C-C NBOMe (small dose, felt serene happiness), MXE (personal favourite, experienced complete ego death. When mixed with weed I experienced the most intense, powerful journey I've ever had), DXM (come up was incredible). Most recently I tried MDMA at a rave, being my first stimulant I wasn't prepared for how incredible it was, definitely will be doing it again!

That's all from me, thanks for reading!

I'm a Clinical Therapist and have always been interested in the controlled use of certain drugs in the use of Therapy. Recently I've been rethinking my theory and model for change in the human psyche and after looking at SR and such I was reminded of PLUR hahaha wow does that bring back memories.

Seems like lots of informed and interesting peeps here. Hope to get some good convos going with some interesting people here on various topics. Thinking back on the first posts' mention of "what you can offer to the community" Well...as a Therapist with 7years experience in the field I wouldn't mind answering questions if you have any regarding experiences with bad trips, drug side effects (like one course away from my cadc), etc.

Take care everyone

Hello people of the SR world :D My name is Skunky, i'm from Wales in the UK. I'm 30 years young, Ride a motorcycle, love drugs, food, wimen and have been growing weed for around 10 years. One evening whilest i was eating my tea and watching the news, the reporter was bangin on about a dark web. A nasty world full of guns pedophilea and " ! DRUGS ! " I was amased at what i had heard and just thought it was nonsence.... Well me being me, I smoked loads of dope and forgot about until this week when i decided to see what drugs can be found on this dark web :) I had seen the Dutch Green Club in the past and wasnt overly impressed so i thought its either gonna be a rip off site of something like DGC. So...  after much faffing about i managed to get everything running realised its not a web site at all, but a different network :D and then... THEN.... i found the Silk Road :D:D:D:D

I'm overwhelmed at watch here on offer for me to get off my tits on :D:D:D fair play, well done you people of SR and thank you. I cant wait to sort out some money !!!

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Trippyskies on April 18, 2012, 05:24 pm
Age: Unknown
Location: Earth
Sex: Sure


I came to the deep web because the top web was just too mainstream for me (cliche, I know). Every cool place I found ended up getting filled with normal people.  For instance, I thought tumblr was awesome, but I think Barack Obama has a page now.  Wow, not where I want to be.

One of the first threads I read at a deep web drug forum was a thread about Methamphetamines.  People talked about it like normal people. There was nobody talking shit. Nobody judged and called them trash.  I don't use meth, but I respect people's choice if they do, and I was amazed to see others there acting the same way.

All I want is freedom and safety in this life.  I want to be able to experience my own body on my own terms, not "their" terms.  For some reason I don't understand why that is such a frowned upon idea.  I must be weird, but if I am, I don't want to be normal. I don't want to even be around the "normal" people. I want to be around other "weirdos."

I love life, I love adventures, I love jumping without looking as long as I think I'll land safely. I think the world is wonderful. There is nothing to fear, but fear itself.

-TrippySkies

Title: Re: New to Silk Road
Post by: goofus on April 19, 2012, 02:19 am
Hi Dougie:

I'm pretty new myself and signed up in January. it took about a month to figure stuff out. Eventually I got a moneypak from Walmart for $150 cash so I would limit my losses to that amt if it went south. I went on the forums for the money guys and found 3 vendors that always delivered but were kind of expensive. BTCBuddy, Sugar Mama, and BTCpal. All charge between 8 and 25% for exchanging your moneypak for bitcoins. Advantage in this technique is that you can do it easily and anonymously without opening up your own acct with Mtgox (a bitcoin trading organization) then opening up an ewallet. I will probably still do that and there are plenty of forum pages that will walk you through that process. I am using Sugar Mama most recently and expect a 2-6 day delivery time from my order. The charge is dependent on the moneypak amount.  you can usually find sugar mama by clicking on the money icon on the left side of the opening page of Silk Road. Then follow her instructions exactly on how to order bitcoins from her. You have to have your moneypak amount and the moneypak code on the card you buy from Walmart or Walgreens or CVS pharmacy. The order page has a box for you to put that info in. There is another box for your password (not your SR password but your acct password). You also have to click on the ellipsis on the top of your order form that has the delivery method. Do that first and then click update before you put your MP # and amt.
Expensive and a little slow, but anonymous and reliable (at least with the ones I mentioned).
Once you see the bitcoins show up, order your poison of choice. then that wait starts. finally, you'll be rewarded with DRUGS IN THE MAIL ;D Yahoo!

Interests include philosophy, literature, nature, the usual.

Finally, I think SR stands for more than a convenient method to acquire drugs, and I'm grateful to be a part of it.

Title: Just another NEWBI saying "HI"

Title: Re: Just another NEWBI saying "HI"
Post by: Prawl42 on April 19, 2012, 06:23 pm
hello! welcome to the forums :) yeah its alot to take in at first!

The best piece of advice you could get is to just read/learn about how SR/Bitcoins/the various encryption methods work as to avoid any mix up later on. defiantly do not rush into your first buy.

As to not getting busted below is a link to a very good guide on staying anonymous on SR from setting up librete (a live linux distro perfect for SR use) to getting your coins into SR safely.

http://dkn255hz262ypmii.onion/index.php?topic=15383.0

Secondly about getting ripped off, stay up to date in the forums any scammers/suspected scammers might have a post or two about them. Also use the vendor's page to view stats on them such as success rate, amount of sales etc.

Lastly a very important one,  if a vendor asks you to finalize early ( release your funds from escrow) then there is not much you can do if something were to happen. Some vendors ask newer members to do this, but id advise finding different vendors until you have a high enough rating.

Sorry if i ran though things a bit fast just giving you a quick overview. But as said up top READ READ READ!

If you need anything else just let me know!
Title: Re: New to Silk Road
Post by: invisibleman_007 on April 19, 2012, 07:03 pm
well I'd use undergroundsyndicate 1) or btc king 2nd)  Underground syndicate was cheaper, (11 btc for 67$) and it was delivered in my account in about 10 minutes.  He uses Chase bank, just take your deposit to the bank and bam btc in your sr account when you get home.  I'm personally not a fan of mp, and I'd stay away from them.  It can take many hours sometimes days for the moneypaks to get processed and you get your btc.    underground sydicate and btc king will do it in less than 1/2 hour !

http://silkroadvb5piz3r.onion/silkroad/user/8184c05ea4

I posted my review about him in his thread here:
http://dkn255hz262ypmii.onion/index.php?topic=15505.15

I was skeptical, but he is quick, very communicative and honest.  No need to set up an account, or give personal information, it's very safe and secure.  I'll be using him again in the near future... Very good vendor, check him out :)

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: SequelTo33rpm on April 25, 2012, 05:26 pm
Good morning/afternoon/evening or whenever the hell you may read this. Name is SequelTo33rpm. I've been on here for a few months actually but never got around to properly introducing myself. Big fan of LSD, 25I-NBOMe, and to a lesser extent MDMA. I am a neuropsychology major and drugs has been a huge area of focus for me, even becoming part of my honors thesis for university. It's astounding how much misinformation and just outright lies are put out on a daily basis by people who have a responsibility to ensure others stay safe. It's fucking incredible that a community like this can exist and behave so well on its own. We are a community of mostly adult, responsible users who make it a priority to still fulfill our obligations in life. There is the occasional scamming vendor or douchebag customer, but in contrast with how much success and sheer decency there has been on SR, it's mind-blowing how well this has come together. SR is the future of the drug trade and so far it's going swimmingly. As a side note, if any of you guys ever have a problem you wish to talk about or just vent, minor or major, message me anytime and I'll do my best to help you out and offer advice. Anything that can be done to make this community a healthier, more responsible one is another kick in the face to people who say drugs are just intrinsically bad and any one who uses them deserves harsh and draconian punishments. Everything will be kept 100% anonymous and please for fuck's sake, do not use any real names and make up locations. Safety and security first. If anyone wants my PGP key for better security, just ask. Peace and much respect to you all.

Title: MIB
Post by: ManInBlack on April 28, 2012, 08:55 pm
I have been stumbling through the forums and main site for over a month now. I must say, the community here is fucking tremendous (minus the scammers/lamers)! I have been talking with some vendors, creating and reading some forum threads, just to get a little familiarized with how things work. I saw this thread and figured since I plan on nestling in here, I better introduce myself. Primarily I am a pirate, grabbing anything from a barney song to newest movie or leaked sex tape (NOT CP). I also like my fair share of drugs and HATE going to the ghetto. I'm just a pussy ass white boy, I don't belong in there (i get robbed)! Hopefully my stay here is as pleasant as I'm looking forward to. So far any questions I have had for the forums or a specific user has been answered thoroughly. I couldn't really ask for more when it comes to a helpful community. This really isn't an intro for me since I can't really give any personal info but I can tell you that gas is 4 fucking dollars a gallon and rising! Good day everyone and I hope to run into a lot of you soon!

-MIB

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: guydangerous on May 02, 2012, 04:23 pm
Hey, Folks...

Found the TOR network about a week ago...been ripping through it, trying to see all there is on here. My take is that either: a) there's not much on the Darknet, mostly because websites want page views, and there's very little you can't discuss on the clearnet already, or b) I just ain't that good searchin' it out. Mind you, I've been at the Hidden Wiki, Hack BB, Zerodays, The Abyss, etc...

Been lurking here, and looking at the very tempting offerings on SR...what I was very happy about was the Drug Safety forum. On the tangential site where "hard" drugs are bought and sold, there is also very frank discussion about safe using, toxicity and addiction.  If ever there was a place where wise words are needed, it's here. I highly recommend erowid.org as well.

Be safe, be smart and remember that just because someone is offering you candy, doesn't mean you should stuff your face with it...

GuyD

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: raveryote on May 11, 2012, 07:01 pm
Quote from: raveryote on April 16, 2012, 10:33 am
Hey all, made a new account cause i couldnt remember my old credentials. i'm raveyote69 under a different name.

for those who havent met me, i'm a young mathematician and i want to develop cryptographic tools for the betterment of society. tor and bitcoin are intensely interesting to me.

i fully support and believe in this website and service, and hope so see it live a very very long time.

go sr!

Haha, i remember that!

Let me elaborate!

I'm raveyote, a young mathematician and college student who believes strongly in the ideals and principles of SR, and in the aspirations of DPR. I can see his vision, i think, and now that I have seen what I have seen, and heard what I have heard, I can no longer stand idly by.

This is my stand. For the longest time, I was "a rebel without cause" but there is more than enough cause, but there was no Cause.

In you, my anonymous friends, I have found my Cause.

One day, when I feel I am ready, I will journey through the world of entheogenic tryptamines, but until that time, when I feel I am mature enough and ready to pop that cherry, I will stick to stimulants, particularly empathogens.

In terms of life goals and carreer, I'll probably develop some amazing new P2P instant messaging and distributed social networking network (not a decentralized federation of servers, a fully supernode-P2P network) that integrates and works seamlessly with the Tor, Bitcoin, Bittorrent, and Jabber networks to deliver content, enable fully anonymous payments where even my grandmother could do it with her ancient dos box (provided she upgraded to a modern version of freedos, she probably wouldnt notice the difference).

I LOVE P2P networks, they are my passion.

Nearly all of the time spent on the computer is either spent learning about P2P networks, studying them for the sheer joy of discovery, or chatting with people who populate the P2P and P2P-related discussion places, be they IRC channels, forums, and whatnot.

I love Silk Road because not only does it put pressure on the street sellers to compete, and competition is always good for buyers, but provides a reasonably safe and secure alternative to trying to buy from some street corner dude in the bad part of town. Silk Road PROVES how powerful P2P technologies such as Tor and Bitcoin REALLY are.

Although the Silk Road hidden service is not decentralized, and has an internal bitcoin mixer rather than decentralizing control, the centralization is probably a good thing in this case, as it allows (competant) administrators to swiftly respond to threats to service, including psychological operations, service interruption or disruption, and other malicious elements.

I probably shouldnt write too much more, as the leos are on the prowl. but i'm always here, feel free to PM me.
