Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: hyruleantoker on May 12, 2012, 04:12 am
HyruleanToker here! Currently in college studying for a degree in Computer Science, my goal is to get into the game industry, and become a programmer for a large game company. I found this site through a close friend who has been the best worst influence in my entire life. He's introduced me to cannabis and recently molly and DMT.
With my addictive personality, I know I must be extremely careful in my choices, but this life is just too fun to completely pass up.
I don't plan to be a frequent buyer, much less a vendor, but I do hope I can be a fairly active member of the community as I learn.

I'm always open to advice and plain conversation.

Until next time,
~HyruleanToker

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: hooray4me on May 14, 2012, 04:23 am
The details of my life are quite inconsequential ... Very well, where do I begin? My father was a relentlessly self-improving boulangerie owner from Belgium with low-grade narcolepsy and a penchant for buggery. My mother was a 15-year-old French prostitute named Chloe with webbed feet. My father would womanize; he would drink. He would make outrageous claims like he invented the question mark. Sometimes, he would accuse chestnuts of being lazy. The sort of general malaise that only the genius possess and the insane lament ... My childhood was typical: summers in Rangoon ... luge lessons ... In the spring, we'd make meat helmets ... When I was insolent I was placed in a burlap bag and beaten with reeds — pretty standard, really. At the age of 12, I received my first scribe. At the age of 14, a Zoroastrian named Vilmer ritualistically shaved my testicles. There really is nothing like a shorn scrotum — it's breathtaking ... I suggest you try it

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: JakiStirner on May 16, 2012, 10:15 am
Hello,

My name is Jaki! The "Stirner" is a reference to one of my favorite anarchist writers. I've known about SR for a while now but just today decided to see what it had to offer. I'm not very impressed with a lot of the pricing, but there are a few things here and there I'm going to have to give a shot come pay day.  ;D

I like pretty much everything but stims, but I especially like dissociatives and psychedelics. My worldview makes it hard for me to avoid bad trips from psys, as I see the world from an anarchist perspective, with politicians and capitalists manipulating and exploiting and murdering in order to preserve their power and wealth. This view seems even sharper and more poignant while tripping and generally leaves me feeling sick, depressed, and often suicidal.

I now work a civilian job in customer service that I very much dislike, but not nearly as much as I disliked being enlisted in the US Army. My coworkers are nice and are the one redeeming quality of the job.

I am bi/pansexual and I have a lot of excruciating questions about my gender identity. I go from deciding to live as a man or live as a woman and back again, but whichever I choose, my mind screams at me that I am wrong, due to various insecurities, fears, and uncertainties. I am in therapy and I have a wonderful transgender girlfriend who is trying to help me through this. The drugs help, too.

So that's me. Probably a lot more information than you care to know.  :P

Post by: Polack on May 17, 2012, 08:57 am
I'm Polack, and it's cool for me to use the slur because I've got a parent with two actual Polish Poles from Poland for THEIR parents.

I'm pretty straight-edge with the exception of binge-drinking about once or twice a month, I like to think of myself as funny, and I most certainly didn't play football back in school.

I'm on Silk Road practically exclusively to buy handguns, since my country heavily restricts the civilian ownership of handguns, and I feel handguns to be necessary for the defense of myself and my family. Don't expect me to be buying any hand-cannons, I've got to keep this kind of thing real low-key. I only see myself realistically buying guns with an eye for small size (less to hide, since it'd be illegal) and low report (since I got to practice with it). Suppressors would be just aces if I could get my hands on any.

Oh, and I drink Coca-Cola like a MOTHER.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: NorCalKing on May 18, 2012, 01:34 pm

Hello All!

We are norcalking, and we are a new vendor to SR specializing in more herbal remedies :-)  We have been in the medical marijuana industry for... oh.. about 2 years or so now. We are pleased to have this opportunity to ease your pain/ put smile on your face/ help relieve a little bit of life's stresses, or shit, just give you a good ol time. So far our experience as a vendor has been AWESOME! You all are so friendly and helpful, and true with your donations. Although we may never be able to see each others faces, it really does feel like a family. And for those of you who believe in the afterlife, we will be wearing norcalking name tags lol (green lettering with a blue background size 16 font /bold/ italic/ and underlined) you never know someone else might have the same name??? lol
The only thing we are new to is the SR site. Everything else is second nature. You will find that we are very fair, timely, and in most cases generous, because we understand compassion. We hope you will appreciate us as much as we appreciate you. We look forward to our time here and continuing to make you happy.  We get up every morning looking forward to checking our page, or the forum just to see if we made someones day! We hope we can make yours!
Peace,

NCK

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: NeuroRelativizer on May 18, 2012, 06:04 pm
Well, hello everyone. It's nice to meet you all. My name says NeuroRelativizer but that's a bit lengthy so feel free to shorten it however you like so long as I can tell you mean me. Neuro's the obvious shortcut but I have no doubt someone on here can come up with something more creative.

My friend introduced me to SR some time ago, but for some reason I'm just now getting around to initializing my forum presence. It really is a mystery, as I have a penchant for online community and I've heard many good things about this one here. Not surprisingly, of course. Regardless of why it took so long as it has, I'm glad to be here now and plan on becoming a familiar sight to all of you, and pleasantly so.

I used to be quite naively gung-ho with drugs, and I'm rather thankful I was never given the opportunity to dive into certain chemicals before I learned that some would not agree with me so well as those I know and love, meaning Mary, Lucy, Molly, and Dimitri. Well, for the most part - I've met Sally (I don't know if anyone actually calls Salvia Sally but I was on a roll with the names) but we didn't have a good foundation to our preceding relationship so we didn't get along very well.

Anyway, glad I finally spotted the intro topic, and I look forward to getting to know all of your online personae. Much love!

Post by: Mishrume on May 25, 2012, 10:05 am
G'day from the land down under!

I go by the name Mishrume (My shroom). As you can probably figure i love the little umbrellas that poke their heads out of the ground for only a few months of the year namely the "subs" variety as that's what we get over in my part of this sunburnt land.

By far my biggest weakness tho is weed. I absolutely love the shit! I've limited myself to only smoking on the weekends (in between jobs) now tho as continuous use over the last 11 years has done me no favours and the types of jobs i work require a D&A during the medical process and random on site D&A's. I wish things were different but ya can't have a high paying job and a high lifestyle it would seem :/ There are ways around it but i just can't be fucked running the gauntlet as we say and being paranoid as fuck that I'll get a random sprung on me and not know for sure that I'll pass so for the most part I'm a good boy when I'm working.

I don't mind synthetics but i don't go out of my way to find them. Had a good run with ice about 6 months ago and it was absolute top notch stuff. Big shards and pure as fuck pretty much delivered straight from the cook. My first blast of that shit (got shouted a pipe) kept me awake from Friday thru Sunday and from then on for a half dozen weekends or so i was buying stupid amounts and it never disappointed. I decided that was enough tho because i was getting pretty scatbrained from it and ppl were starting to notice.

LSD however i do love! but unfortunately it is hard to come by in my part so it's much of a special treat when i do manage to procure a half dozen tabs or so. I could shift that shit like candy which is one of the main reasons i joined up on SR but financially am unable to do anything about that atm so I'll just have to settle for licking pictures of blotter on the screen and reminiscing about past fun times with Lucy.

Coke. Seen an 8b of it once but never tried any. The bloke who had it was saving it for a special occasion (Prick!) and didn't want to sample any out to me :( Lately I've been having recurring dreams about snorting copious amounts of the shit, like stupid stupid amounts piled on the table and me stuffing as much up my nose as humanly capable like ya see in parody vids so i guess the candy shop is subconsciously calling my name??

Speed. GTFO.. nobody uses it anymore but it was my first hard drug that i tried and i have no interest in it. Maybe that was due to the fact that i was add and done my fair share of tweaking at school.

Heroin. Never tried it and i have no interest in doing so.

Ecstacy. Meh.. I used to have a love affair with it years ago and it broke up a relationship. I stopped using x after the breakup but mainly because i didn't like paying $50 for caffeine loaded shit.. So I'm interested in pursuing straight up MDMA now that it is within my grasp somewhat.

Anyways enough dribbling shit about myself.

I'm here to meet like minded peeps and have fun in the process. So if you feel that we could do business or just share info and opinions then by all means drop me a line. I've been lurking the forums, SR and TA for about a week now and i can already see a few vendors that I'm sure i could trust. On that note, I'm still researching the whole bitcoin thing and am not ready to commit yet but rest assured i will once i nut it all out.

For now, peace out!

Shrume

P.s i run the handle Mishrume on SR and TA so you can be assured it's me.

Post by: Freeman on May 28, 2012, 07:34 am
I think I am SR member #592.  I've been here for about a year and have seen SR grow and evolve as the community exploded.  Mostly it's all been for the better.

I'm not sure where to begin introducing myself beyond that.  I love music and listen to a wide variety but mostly electronic (acid techno, minimal techno, drum n bass, some dubstep, ambient) and punk (most 90s skate punk).  I am extroverted and love going to shows, engaging in debates/discussions, parties, etc.  I'm very interested in political theory, philosophy, foreign policy, etc.

Drugs:  I LOVE cannabis and have smoked all-day nearly every day for about 2.5 years now.  My THC tolerance is out of control.  LSD is another top favorite but I also like MDMA and mushrooms.  Outside of those I have only experimented with DMT and other psychedelic drugs.  As a general rule I avoid opiates and amphetamines.  I'm here for the therapeutic benefits.

Title: My Introduction
Post by: saccovan on May 31, 2012, 11:37 am
My name is Saccovan after the 2 Italian anarchists Ferdinand Sacco and Bart Vanzetti which implies something about my personal views on the justice system.  I am a retired computer security specialist and somewhat semi-famous hacker and member of a well known full disclosure group that published many exploits for UNIX systems back in the early to late 90's.  Please don't ask me to crack a website or exploits but I can give you some advice if you have a reasonable query. 

I'm an anarchist through and through and I am very much happy that something like SilkRoad and BMR exist to connect people who have something to offer and responsible individuals who know the difference between legality and morality (i.e. just because something is illegal doesn't mean it's immoral and just because something is legal doesn't mean it's moral).  Sites like these and hidden links is the ultimate form of civil disobedience.

I also dabble in organic and inorganic chemistry, permaculture, sustainability, and off the grid living. I'm looking for interesting people to have productive discussions and hopefully I can share some of my wisdom to others.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: German Kraut on June 02, 2012, 03:10 pm
Quote from: patetin on June 01, 2012, 08:41 pm

got scammed in my 1st transaction lost some 48 bt and i am so mad im telling everybody grrr
what to do ? cant scam someone else.. bad karma
1 st transaction and got scammed is realy bad. Most people would SR never give a second chance if the 1 st transaction went wrong.
Before you buy always check the feedback and take a look here in the scammming list and  read the sellers reviews of their products.
That´s the best way to find good & trusted vendors.I have 47 transactions and only 1 deal was wrong (Team Noriega).All other deals were clean.
Wish you the best ...
Cheers

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: TroopCarrier on June 04, 2012, 12:46 am
Greetings Folks,

Well after a fair amount of trials and tribulations I am this close [---] to having everything sorted and ready to put in my first few orders. After negotiating the ins and outs or SR, GPG keychain access, bitcoins, ewallets, tormail and everything else, I'm waiting on a last clarification from Jeremy at SpendBitCoins then I'll be depositing and ordering away. Thanks to all for all the forum discussions that have steered me in the right direction and looking forward to having a chat myself at some stage with you all.

Finally, love the idea of SR, I'm a responsible adult, have a respectable job and am very safety conscious but to have to resort to purchasing our wares online is really extreme in this day of 'freedom' and 'liberation'. After all, if I cant decide whats right for me then where does that leave me as a reasonable respectable adult in this day and age.

Saying that, if I hadn't have left my home to move to the big smoke to start a new career I probably wouldn't need the site, but it can be difficult and slightly edgy to find a reputable DD that I'd feel comfortable around in a new town.

Looking forward to meeting you all.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Pupilsbrah on June 04, 2012, 03:22 pm
Sup roadies!!!
My pseudonym is 'Jesse'. My goals here are to source some safe, pure, high quality substances (mainly MDMA/pills) strictly for myself and my closest friends.
My motivation for these goals:
I once paid 35 dollars for an apparent ecstasy pill that left me severely ill and a metallic taste in my mouth for over a fortnight.
In Australia drugs are 'stepped on' an astonishing amount before reaching the end users. I also feel LE's structure and policies are responsible for this situation, putting countless lives in danger and directing money to the hands of the real criminals.
 
I am grateful for this opportunity where I can continue to expand my experiences, with a much more acceptable risk.
THANK YOU SR VENDORS!!!!
- Jesse
 aka Pew-pills-brethren

Hello,
I am a chronic pain sufferer, underground medical cannabis patient, and refugee from the farmers market (around 2 years of great buyer relationship down the drain)

a little research and I ended up here.
probably should have moved here earlier as I am now realizing FM was doing a lot of things wrong safety wise.
also its probably not the right place to ask but does anyone know if the vendor "leon" was caught up in the FM bust?
pretty much exclusively bought through him and i feel pretty bad that they are gone.
but here you all are and there is hope again.
thank you all for doing what you do, I would be a drooling vegetable if not for you and those like you taking risks for my freedom.
hopefully lexi or mryellow or one of the other high rated cannabis vendors will see some of my money real soon before my ration runs out and i disappear into the abyss.
also isn't dark souls a blast ^_^

Hi Drugfather,

I am a newbie and just getting started.  I have only been a member for about 5 days.  I recognized the DMT molecule as your avatar.  How very cool.  I am an organic chemist and have worked in drug discovery in the areas of neurological disorders such as Alzheimer's and Parkinson's disease, etc.  As for my profile, I am single and like to experiment with drugs.  Years ago I extracted DMT from Mimosa Hostillis (purple pink) root bark that I got from a vendor in Illinois at the time. It was fun and enjoyable.  I used it for myself and a close friend of mine who unfortunately died of cancer in 2007.  I used to send it to him in a small plastic vial that I would get at Walgreens.  Anyway, that is the scoop from here.  I am excited to be a part of the community and if I can be of any help to anyone please feel free to send me a message.  I am mostly into psychedelics and Molly.

Cheers,

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: LeftCrtl on June 23, 2012, 04:53 pm
Quote from: DrGonzo666 on June 22, 2012, 06:44 pm
Any advice for new buyers would be greatly appreciated.
Use PGP encryption when sending any message to the seller, and when submitting your address. Some of the exit nodes are run by the FBI. This stops them knowing enough to find you. This isn't confirmed, but it's highly likely.

Hi Folks!

My name is DrWhite (or you can call me "DOC" as some have appropriately nicknamed me) I am fairly new to SR ~ 2 mos. now. I like many others on here have had negative experiences with online pharmacies. 99% are scams so don't think you are that lucky. I have sold a variety of products in real life for almost 10 years now so I feel I am well experienced with drugs and the drug game.. SR and bitcoin however was completely new to me and threw me on a steep learning curve. I am still working out the kinks but am figuring it out thanks to the helpfulness and advise of kind people here on SR. As a vendor I would like to contribute to SR and what it stands for with excellent products, customer service and careful maneuvering as well as virtually untraceable stealth methods.

Currently I sell commercial/regular quality weed but am planning on expanding to some other products as well. Take a look at my listings here:

1  OZ- http://silkroadvb5piz3r.onion/silkroad/item/9b3b52de63

I will do larger amounts but not with everyone and never on a first order.

I am working very hard to cultivate great relationships with vendors and buyers alike here on SR. I look forward to providing a discreet and reliable service to my customers for as long as possible.

Kind Regards,

DrWhite

Post by: Sykness on July 07, 2012, 08:26 am
Hello, people of SilkRoad, My name is Sykness and I am new to the site and all of it's awesome qualities. From my understanding, Silkroad works as a system of rating, being a good buyer and also being a good vendor, and although I have not had either happen in my time being a member on Silkroad, I want to get in touch with the community because I want to be trusted. For what you may ask, well I see how some people become vendors on the site and earn extra or even make their living from doing so. I am currently a "Street" Vendor which before SilkRoad you all had to deal with those people, but I want to become more. I want to become a top ranked Vendor of SilkRoad and have the credability as some of the other top ranked. As of now I am still a non-seller account but not for long. In the next week I will upgrade my account and attempt to also become a successful Vendor. Mostly consisting of Cannabis or "Marijiuana" but not entirely. I have some fair prices in mind for when all that starts to happen, but what I want right now is to reach out to the community on the forum get to talk to people and see if I can gain some customers. If you're reading this and saying to yourself "Wow "cool story bro" I would have to say it's the truth and I don't have much else right now other than my word. So please get in touch if you seem intersted in me as a choice for a Vendor, I want to get people what they want. That way it satisfies the both Vendor and buyer.

Title: HELLO Silk Road!!!
Post by: FrankiePP on July 10, 2012, 11:57 am
Hi everybody!

My name is Frankie and I'm in love for pink things...that said I'm trying to experiment with some electronic stuff to make some music (mostly dubstep, electro, house, tech or experimental).
I've started studying the human mind and making some kind of metaphysical speculations three years ago and I got into McKenna's studies.
I'm fascinated on how psychedelic substances or particular physical changes can produce effects on our relation with the world (inner and outer) and that's why researching about the human evolution and the omnipresent triple relationship "human beings"-"spiritulal world"-"alterated state of consciusness" became my favourite hobby!
...And, of course, since I love to test the theory with practical experiments, I came into this community hoping to find reliable samples of psychoactive substances for my passion  :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D

All the best to this flourishing community!!!

PS: Oh and I can't hide that it pushed me to join you guys a tiny bit... MUCH the idea of this sort of phantom zone kickin' the a** of those clowns who try to make us modern slaves with their ridiculous politics!  ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D

I was desperate for this amazing and beautiful experience again, however, there is not a reliable supply of psychedelics in my area (I lucked up with the shrooms). So, once I learned of SR, I decided to check it out. I hung around for a month or two just gazing at all the listings before making my first purchase (GoldieLox's LSD). I made my forum account later to review this awesome vendor. I hope to soon become an established buyer and forum member. I believe in SR and want to offer positive support for this community.


As for my drugs of choice--marijuana and psychedelics solely.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: cab3rn3tm3rl0t on July 14, 2012, 05:49 pm
Hey, everyone! I was having a glass of wine when trying to come up with a username, so it came pretty naturally.

I've known about Tor for awhile, but never bothered to use it under the assumption that it was just child porn and poor websites with no funding. My girlfriend asked me if I was familiar with Silk Road, and after days and days of research, countless how-to guides and lots of consultation with a friend who majored in Computer Science, I found myself here, and I can't express how impressed I am with the community. The programming, the privacy, the state of mind most users have, it's all impressed me so much. After lurking for the past little while, I thought I should take the next step and try to get involved with the community, contribute to the forums where I can, and support the vendors.

Thank you to the mods and admins who do an incredible job at keeping this place going. I'm going to be making my first purchase soon, and I want to make sure it goes as smoothly as possible, so you'll likely see me around the forums a fair amount in the next little while asking silly n00b questions. Thanks for putting up with me as I get more familiar with everything.

Oh, and I'm here to find some things that aren't easy when you live in a small town like I do. I've experimented a bit here and there, but haven't done anything to the point of danger. Very casual MDMA user about once a month when I go out, tried LSD once with my girlfriend as a sitter, a bump of coke here and there. I treat drugs like a buffet, and I want a small taste of everything at one point or another.

Thanks again, Silk Road! You're MDMAzing!

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Drksdfmn138 on July 15, 2012, 11:26 am
Hello SR family, I'm Drksdfmn138. Thats a mixture of Dark Side of the Moon with out vowels and the Misfits We are 138. I came to the SR because of a buddy of mine, We're both interested in making the most out of our freedom and believe its our choice to use our hard earned money as we please. Bitcoins are the future! Anyways I was purchasing with him for awhile but I had to move so I started up my own account and have been enjoying it thoroughly. I've talked with so many nice people (and a few trolls). But I mainly use this site to help me find the medicine I need. I'm a car wreck survivor and I deal with chronic pain everyday. Mainly strong cannabis and sometimes opiates... Some days its a must for opiates as i have metal strewn throughout my body and that shit hurts like nobody's business. But as I cannot work, I enjoy being able to talk with people here on the forums and always hunting for great deals on pain relieving strains and phenos. I take care of my great grandmother to keep her out of a nursing home. Also my grandfather has Parkinson's so when his meds stopped working, i introduced him to cannabis to help his shakes and pains. I really feel that since i'm still alive after my car accident, I'm here to help people on this earth deal with pain and suffering. Something I've come to know quite well. I am a happy person though sometimes its hard to not let the pain in my legs get the best of me. But I do my best to exercise and eat right, as well as use meds sparingly when I need them. Music helps me out alot, always seems to lift my mood and spirit. So anyways enough of that.. Thanx SR members for welcoming me to your community. Long days and pleasant nights!

Hey SR, I'm so glad to be a part of this community.  Sometimes this whole SR thing really makes me feel like Im dreaming.  I went from absolutely no connects (its been bad lately) to THE BEST CONNECTS overnight, and I just wanted to say "thanks silk road".  With all the new rcs around and stuff, I thought I'd never get pure mdma again and then all of a sudden there's SR and my prayers are answered.

What is something that can legally be sold in any retail store in America , but when I asked SR staff if I may sell this item, they clearly told me "NO"  and in so many words that I'm not allowed to sell that here!!?  WTF could it be??  There can't be something u could put on Walmarts shelves but not on SR???  Could there be???  Good Luck

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: gonzorx on July 18, 2012, 07:16 am
gonzorx here. I am both buyer and seller under different account names (security, sorry... trust nobody and all...) and use this account to be myself rather than an ass kissing buyer or selective scamming vendor without fear of reprisal ;-)

SR has been hit and miss for me. For the stuff I like, I can source it better quality and cheaper locally. I thought it might be good for products like cocaine, heroin and methamphetamine which are in low supply / bad quality in my local black market. This has definitely not been the case unfortunately! Seems like everybody has the same rubbish in every country with a different price tag. SR could effectively normalize world prices which would be interesting. I get a lot of flack for being so forthright but know that the cynical (reads: realistic) people amongst us will agree with my statements.

After blowing a lot of cash on this site, this is what I have noticed in terms of good deals (good price, good quality).

SR drug pros: dmt, lsd, psylo, 2c-b, lsd, mephedrone, mdma, mda, mescaline, amphetamine sulphate, quality hash (probably any other psychedelic variant)
SR drug cons: the stuff everybody wants: cocaine, methamphetamine, heroin

Good project though. I like the potential altruism of keeping violent crime out of drug consumption. Something that should have ended after Alexander The Great!

good luck

Hey everyone!

My name is TheStateOfMind,

I have had many wonderful experiences using SR the past couple of months, but I never got a chance to introduce myself. So here it is:
I am a professional jazz pianist and consider myself somewhat of a psychonaut. There is nothing more intriguing
to me than the explorations of the subconscious, or as I like to call it "The Explorations Of The State Of Mind".
I love taking hallucinogens by myself, that includes my favorite psychedelic LSD and the world's most amazing
creation, DMT. I am very thankful for being a part of this community and would like to thank all the amazing
vendors that risk everything to bring and share with us their amazing products. The quality of everything on here is
absolutely amazing and mind-blowing. I cannot wait to try more of the goods that are available now and in the near
future. I am always open to talk about hallucinogens, music, or anything! So just PM me 8)

Peace,
TheStateOfMind

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: NewYorkFatCap on July 21, 2012, 12:43 pm
Greetings to the SR community.
 I'm NewYorkFatCap from the UK. Have been on here a week now and feel honored to have discovered this wonderful place called 'SR' I have done nothing but learn, having been trawling these forums for a week now; so much to digest! So moreish !
 I can now encrypt my mails, browse anonymously, basically i feel that I learned more this week about computers and their uses than in the rest of my life. I had no idea, I was only trying to find a way onto piratebay and then I discovered tor. I had no idea of darknet. No wonder its kept hush hush. Surprised at the blatan links tot child abuse sites, really quite disturbing. I suppose that is the price of free speech, you can't approve of it all. Still very wrong though.
 Have been in the herbal trade for 20 yrs now ( done well, never caught or suspected ) and will soon be setting up a small sellers account ( under diff. name of course ! ) for the UK market to see how things go.
 I doff my cap to DPR and all the rest of the community,
Look forward to banter and advice in the forums,
Peace and love always,
NYFC. 8)

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: trails on July 23, 2012, 09:03 pm
Hi.  I just discovered this particular thread. I'm in my 50's.  I work several part time jobs while in the process of trying to start a business.  I'm a bit hesitant to go into any more detail than that only because I meet many people in my work and any one of them could be an SR member and might recognize who I am.  Suffice it to say they're just normal occupations. 

I am a light pot smoker now.  I partied a lot when I was younger and did small recreational doses of psychedelics.  I recently became interested in using LSD for the purpose of ego death but can't find it where I live.  Then I discovered SR.  I've been gradually taking increased dosages and reading a lot about ego death.  I still haven't achieved it yet but I have experienced various degrees of ego loss. 

Now that I've read more about ego death and it's possible after effects (and after noticing the after effects of my last trip) I've decided that I need to hold off on that goal for awhile until I get the practicalities of my life better situated but I'm still shopping on here to build up a little stash for later when I'm ready to pursue that. 

Like many other members I've had both good and bad purchasing experiences on SR.  It's definitely a very beneficial site and I hope it can continue. 
And the forums are very helpful with so many good spirited people sharing their knowledge.

Peace

Just a new member from Aus.

Signed up to this site to buy from overseas as the MDMA and pills here, half are poison and the other half are duds.

The police cracking down on MDMA and pills in our country are wasting time and resources.

So many people I know have turned to meth because the pills have been really shit, and meth is a whole lot worse than decent MDMA.

Also people have taken pills that have had other shit in them and have found themselves in hospital, myself included.

Planning on buying small amounts of decent goods to essentially keep myself and my friends safe when we go out.

People are not going to stop taking pills, but I just wished that the cops would see they are doing more harm than good cracking down on MDMA.

PS: As a non-native speaker, I hope you will excuse my english.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Drksdfmn138 on August 03, 2012, 10:57 am
Quote from: Tulkki on August 03, 2012, 12:10 am
Sup all.

Im really new to SR, just registered last week. So far Ive bought BTC's (waiting them to arrive into my SR wallet) and installed GPG and learned how to use it. I think I have understood the main points here.

Apparently I need to buy some books or something to gain reputation in order to gain the sellers trust?

I noticed some sellers(popular ones judging from the product comments) clearly say that they dont accept escrow. Isnt this a (very) bad thing? It says everywhere that I should not trust a seller who doesnt accep escrow?
Also, is it possible to receive packages into a local post office(AND pick them up by using a "nickname" like SR account name) instead of an street adress?

Thanks in advance,
-T

Sellers don't like it when you buy just E books to raise stats... Some will accept you if you politely ask if you can purchase a small order with them. There are also vendors who will sell to you even if you're new because they ONLY work through escrow. My advise to you, don't finalize early ever. Unless you are certain the vendor is legit. I've been lucky that I was able to order from good vendors that didn't require FE and I made good stats quickly. However I used respect and politeness, and always PM'd my vendors first and asked permission to order. And always thank them in the forums and write good reviews of their wares.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: jumpingBeans on August 08, 2012, 04:55 am
  Hey all.  Alright, so I am jumpingBeans (obviously). Pleased to meet you all.  I like to think of myself as just an open minded individual, who developed a taste for pretty much every drug known to man, so long as it's good quality... I got out of the scene because of the apparent lack of moderation and the fact that it's full of so much grief (seen a lot of funerals and jail sentences) and I actually lead a pretty straight (I'd never say normal) life... but mostly because the quality, availability is always so touch and go.
  So I came to the road, lookin for a reliable source of good gear, without all the sad stuff and since my short time here, I have found a community, one of smart people with good morals and similar interests to myself.  So I've kept reading, researching and I've learnt soooooo much about my computer, the internet and lots of other things that I always thought were possible, but never truly understood, I guess.
  This site is great, thanks DPR and everybody else involved.  I came lookin for so little, in retrospect, compared to what I have found here.  I look forward to my future with SR and these forums, and thanks to anybody who actually went to the effort of reading this long arsed post, I know I ramble.  jumpingBeans
Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: infiniteSeries on August 08, 2012, 02:15 pm
Hi, all

Update.

I am becoming more used to the SR main site, and I am gaining clarity in what I want out of SR. I don't spend time posting on these forums, so please let this serve as a notice to any concerned party, as I am not on here to build a reputation through posting. I am primarily focused on engaging in large purchases of Dutch/German MDMA & E, along with some small personal USA purchases of all variety. I am a solution oriented person, and I plan to remain on SR for a long time. My interest is to build a reputation as a a buyer that vendors trust and want to deal with. I have been successful so far in maintaining great buyer stats, but it is possible that may change in the future, especially as the amount of my international orders increases - I presume there will be a growing likelihood of seizure, and other mishaps.

The vendors that have dealt & communicated with me know that I am communicative, polite, and courteous.

I want to make every effort to satisfy the vendors on their end, and to build & protect my reputation as an honest buyer.

Vendors I have purchased from so far:
WestCoastRX
SpiritDoor
OCKing
USABeans
SuperTrips
BigBuff


I will mostly check the forums and my eMail on days when SR main site is down.

Regards,

infinteSeries

Hello!  I just stumbled on the site yesterday after learning that there was such a thing as the deep web.  My favorite subject is myself.  Just kidding.  I'm in my mid-20s and unattached.  I am always looking for books on topics not exactly popular or known to the mainstream because I believe if an idea is generally believed or supported by the masses, or the government, or organized religion, there's something wrong with it.  Anyway, while I was randomly clicking around to various videos on Youtube, I found a description of this site there, which is unfortunate in some ways because I already fear the consequences of overexposure, even though I just started visiting the site.  I love it and would really like it if the fascist government of our beloved USA kept to its own affairs, but we all know the government of the USA does not usually concern itself with protecting liberty. 

I usually sit in my office to keep up appearances that I am concerned with the progress of the project I'm helping to manage.  My favorite drug at the moment is Adderall, especially when I have a book I really want to knock out in a day.  I have no boss but I don't want to rub that in too many faces, so being interested in everything and studying all the time for the last two years while I held down this job not only has helped to pass the time but also has really given me a leg up on the rest of the world so if I ever decide to go to medical school rather than flee the USA, I will have the advantage of having read just about all the great books of Western Civilization.  Nothing beats Adderall for motivation!

My main hobbies are playing piano (jazz) and playing poker.  The latter of which has afforded me the opportunity to fund my ever increasing amphetamine addiction, and buy nice things for the wife so she doesn't bitch as much when I come home at 5 AM after playing for 12 hours.

Hello :)

I'm a Scandinavian Psychonaut who's here for the acid... I'm a huge fan of science, football (or soccer, if you're from the wrong side of the pond), philosophy, and I'm chuffed to see reflected and intelligent people making their own decisions and proving people's quaint notions about drugs wrong.

Long may this place live, and I hope to be a familiar "face" for years to come.

-Icker-

I remember several large Investment Fir One of them was ms dumping money into dot.coms in the 90's. One. of them being Napster. Even though Napster was illegally downloading music the attention it was getting was of great interest to Traders. I think SR has that same opportunity. Thnx

I enjoy its exclusivity the way it is :)

I also like to sample psychedelics but not to often as i don't get the time, im keen on shrooms and LSD  (although iv not tried acid yet) but a wee bit wary of research chemicals at least until i have enough information to fully educate myself on the effects ect.
One of the best things iv found on here is the amount of information available, its a brilliant way of getting knowledge, the site has allowed me to make an informed choice about what i do and do not want to do, this is what i consider one of the most important things about drug use, no scare mongering just facts backed up with experience/evidence.
Thank you to all who run and contribute.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Vyndrah on August 17, 2012, 06:45 am
Ello SR. I'm Vyndrah.
After spending years in the US rave scene peddling various wares of the best quality possible, my sources have all but dried up or went dark. I currently only have access to DMT and of course methylone.
Methylone is becoming a plague in the rave scene in my area, with every kid and his mother selling it off as molly. The pressed pills are also completely untrustworthy and people are dying off of this crap.
My goal here on the SR is to bring quality and purity back to my local scene with the help of many of the amazing vendors here. I look forward to doing business with many of you, and I wish you all luck and safe trading.
Much PLUR,
-Vyndrah

Post by: strangemagic on August 17, 2012, 11:16 am
@ Marko1952:
If you go to https://mtgox.com you can see the current price of Bitcoins in various currencies, use the drop-down box in the top-right to choose your currency. At the time of writing, the price of a Bitcoin in Canadian Dollars is CA$13.24
It varies a lot though. I think it has increased by about 50% in the last month or so
Good luck.

Solon here,

Been out of the drug scene (mostly!) for over a decade.  Interested in exploring microdosing with ethnogens to enhance my creativity and overall sense of well-being.  Also curious about low to mid-size dosages of MDMA for therapeutic use.  I no longer have 'IRL' connections nor was I comfortable searching them out in today's over-regulated and criminalized marketplace.  Once I researched SR, TOR, BTC and PGP it became clear to me that perhaps a golden age of person freedom and responsibility is dawning at last! Thank you to those who have created and maintain this site.  May its longevity be a testament to your ingenuity!

With gratitude, Solon

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Astaroth on August 22, 2012, 05:06 pm
I have been a member for 1 year but have only lurked in the forums.  I am a high experienced psychonaut.  I have enjoyed the SR community and decided to share this:

I am sacrificed again on the ancient alter of my dreams. Now and forever, the priest holds up my beating heart for all to see. And in this way I am freed, for what was hidden is now revealed. Blood red I cry out, and from the depths of me, the winged beast is released. That griffin of old. That terrible bird. That Grendel. Astaroth. Rising from the east, the place of the sun's fiery birth, he spreads gnarled wings that fan the wicked flames he chokes forth. His eyes pierce Heaven. His mighty roar shakes the very pillars of the earth. He is both Visigoth and Leviathan. His claws scrape the acrid air surrounding, and the mountains tremble in his presence. His stride is of a mile, as his journey he undertakes. Monstrous his temperament, for he means no good to those he would oppose. His dominance in the hoary realm underfoot assured, he takes to air, his environ to survey, his displeasure to assuage. And even the air, that second element, to him is prey as he possesses the sky. He seeks Zion. That first among places. That worthy goal. That dragon hive. In union there with the universal essence, shall he dwell. In fury he makes his way. Forces of nature sing to the negative. The repository vessel occupied unfit. Vengeance resounds as his head he does twirl into the astral. And to Hell’s gate he ventures. There, all manner of beast do him assail. And the cosmic sword he unsheathes. The heads of wretches roll on Hell’s floor, there to rot for an eternity staring into the empty darkness that is Hell’s light. And to flight again he resumes. His course set. As a storm rising, he cuts the willful air. Him, no gravity can avail. With stroke of wing bending the night, he navigates the black sheet, the empty loft. Stars for a guide, his strident move he makes. And in midair his journey delayed. A shadow ascending, spectre from the unknown, revealing woe to those perceiving, does he spy. A shapeless form of endless girth, a devouring maw. That perfect evil. Reaper. The challenge set. The gauntlet thrown. The tangle destined. His move he makes. With Heaven’s fire he does strike the immortal ghost, risen from a thousand graves, meaning ill. His armored tail he swings as Thor his mighty hammer would. Spectre and he, hurling, churning, whirling through time. A cosmic dance performed. Thunder rolling on the plain. Lightning striking to and fro. War waged. As titans do they struggle, one with the other. At length, the stars reveal the lost cause, the crushed, the vanquished spirit. And Astaroth summons forth the astral roar, and shakes the stars, and with utter strength the demon he does kill. Though wounded in the fray, the firebird rises. As the Phoenix is transformed out of the ashen pile, so too the winged warrior. Ascension thus granted, his path is clear and on it he goes. Seeking skyward, the tops of mountains are but a resting point. A respite on the eternal path. And on the highest peak, his path he plots with accurate decision. The making of stars his goal. He who would sac Heaven and swallow its yoke. The journey interrupted, resumed. And Heaven did cry out, for its fate was sealed. The starmaker on the horizon. Yet, delayed again. His ilk, in midair perceiving, his attention draws. Bright as the sun, the she bird. To her side he wings. And breathes the fire of her perfumed essence displayed. The bounty of life therein stored. The milk and honey. The hypnotic. And he dwells momentarily in that grace. With slanted eyes drinks in the pool that is she. The oasis. Adelinde. His black heart swells in the onslaught of all that she is. In her thrall he is captured. Her spell is cast. She, also not withstanding the beast of old, is likewise drawn. And gainst the starry night framed, in that instant, they are one. Priest and priestess entangled in the night sky. In the eternal now are they consecrated and with venomous injection the bond is set. The shared poison ingested. And eye within eye they roil through the nocturnal. Set against a pane of the everlasting universal lights that do them illuminate. And their throaty dragonsong, like the blowing of Joshua’s horn, that wall crumbling device, is heard. Their quest into the ether now twofold. For each seeks the universal essence divine and the divination of the triune with their mate. Together they will rip the seal on fate’s book and scratch as new the fiery symbols of their destined births. As stars and even galaxies do collide, so too their wills with the evanescence of life. Transformation complete, they glide onward. To Heaven’s porch they steer and there do perch. For all is theirs. The gates there emblazoned with the eye of God to them swing wide and into the sublime they tread. Discovery resounds of the light and source. Into the heart of Heaven’s bower do they spring. The hosts rejoicing, they hear in refrain. In disassemblege of all, they are caught up. Their migration into essence assured, toward the center of the light they move. In transubstantiation with the divine. Transmutation into light. Essence Illuminati.  8)

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: dkmonk on August 23, 2012, 04:08 am
Just read as much as you can about the basics such as, bitcoin (ways to attain it), PGP, and the way things work. Then research the vendors of whatever substance you want to buy to make sure you are using a vendor that best suits your needs. Use the search function before posting a thread asking a question.

That is about it. Use common sense and think things through before doing them then you should be fine. A lot of new users don't do this and pay for it.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: unreadable33 on August 24, 2012, 08:39 pm
Hey guys, I'm unreadable. I've been hearing about silkroad on an image board I'm on all the time. I finally decided to find it, and it is more beautiful than I imagined. I just have one question. I was cruising around the site and kept seeing FE, I know it is probably a dumb question but what does this stand for?
Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Dieseler on August 24, 2012, 10:28 pm
Quote from: unreadable33 on August 24, 2012, 08:39 pm
Hey guys, I'm unreadable. I've been hearing about silkroad on an image board I'm on all the time. I finally decided to find it, and it is more beautiful than I imagined. I just have one question. I was cruising around the site and kept seeing FE, I know it is probably a dumb question but what does this stand for?

FE means "Finalize Early".

When you place an order, it will show "processing" until the vendor ships it.
Then it will change to "in transit". 
At this time you will be given the option to "finalize" the order, acknowledging you received the package and everything was good.

Here are some words directly from a vendor I spoke with about FE..

"Here's the deal with FE from my perspective...

The moment an order is placed, the funds for that order are placed in escrow by SR. The order is also assigned a "finalize" date - 17 days into the future.

The way things should work (and almost always do work) is that the seller ships the product, the buyer receives it - and then the buyer logs into SR and rates the transaction - the finalize.
It is at that moment that the funds from the order leave escrow and are accessible by the vendor.

Unfortunately, a significant percentage of people never acknowledge receipt of their orders... Right now I have four orders in my queue that I shipped as long as two weeks ago representing close to ($) that will auto-finalize over the next day or so as the 17 days will be up.
So - technically - I've had ($) in proceeds against inventory that I've long since shipped sitting there, inaccessible for two weeks!

Two or three weeks ago there was a single buyer who had three ($) orders totaling ($) waiting to be finalized. I needed to purchase new stock... That ($) would have come in handy.
Eventually he went in and "finalized" and I got the money."

Hope that answers your question...
Some people choose to Finalize Early as a symbol of complete trust and respect to the vendor.

-Dieseler

I like the idea of getting your drugs from a dealer u never have to meet, see, and know the name of. on the street, its  very risky, and i shit bricks every single time i score, even though i've been a user for over 8 years. I had a couple of close calls with the harder sutff, and got busted a couple of times with weed. Luckily the cops here can be bribed, so no record on me. Haha!

One other reason why i like the forums and the silk road is because it is a big "FUCK YOU!" to all the governments and all centralized forms of control!
I LOVE IT!

I would like to eventually buy some LSD, cos its really expensive here, and it is also probably one of the safest things to ship internationally.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Warlocks1 on September 03, 2012, 02:52 am
Good day
Just starting using site and find these forums very useful.  Wish there were more posts on where to get more "found" items.  Mostly name brand stuff.  Anyway, I come to this site for personal use rather than selling purposes.  I grow my own supplies and deal locally, but am always interested in checking out new products.  I mostly scour the netherwebs for business ops, and other cool stuff.  So when I come across useful info for the rest of ya I will post.  Any knowledge of where to locate "lost and found" items is appreciated.  Here's my free tip of the day for my new friends:  FREE NETFLIX AND HULU!!

*A (Activated) Prepaid Card or Gift Card with $0.00 Balance on it
*Internet
*Paypal
*Brain (Not Mandatory)Confused

First you want to make a paypal account like a new one or you can use your own but make sure it has no cash on it then you want to get your pre-paid gift card or visa card with no money on it, after that just link the card with your paypal and then go make a free trial on netflix with that paypal with the card on it that has NO money, and it should connect you then after the trial is over it will not let you access your 8) netflix so just go back and make another with the same information it doesn't matter and if you check your paypal it should still be 0.00 if you had no money on it but you will still be getting free trials as much as you like ive been doing this for half a year so far.

This method also works with Hulu, if you find more stuff it works with let me know on the reply peace :D

About 48 hours ago I got an illicit thrill when I found something new. Not intending to stay long, I typed a throw-away phrase as a log-in that described how I felt at the time.

Then I got a sense of nostalgia when I realized I was going to be browsing the internet just like 10+ years ago on dial-up in the middle of nowhere in a rainstorm, constantly cutting out, and pages failing to load for hours at a time.

Then I got a little excited at the prospect of having access to stuff I'd given up on having access to.

Then I spend two days researching and realized that due to the draconian laws of the brainlessly conservative society I made the mistake of placing myself in, I couldn't get the stuff after all.

But then I posted on these forums anyway.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Henry2102 on September 12, 2012, 10:46 pm
I am Henry.

I am interested in learning more about cryptography, being part of the revolution of the monetary system, buying drugs for cheaper than they are available in my locale so I can earn a buck reselling them on the street, acquiring bitcoins and hopefully trading them pofitably, and being a member of this amazing community. I have been silently observing the forums for a few weeks now and decided I should make an account.

I have not yet purchased anything through SR, and I so far have only about .004 bitcoins (and precisely 22 cents USD) to my name (this being the primary reason I have yet to purchase through SR). Luckily I found about ten hours work at $12/hr for tomorrow, so I should have some startup-money shortly.

I am just now trying to figure out how PGP encryption works (seems fairly simple and I will be posting my public key to the appropriate thread shortly for a test-run).

Thank you all for existing. It seems to me that this is the front-lines of the greatest battle mankind has ever fought, and if we win, we will be winning true freedom, as the forefathers of this country hoped their constitution would provide for us.
Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: juan freemann on September 13, 2012, 01:31 am
Hey SilkRoad
I'm sitting here at my computer desk with one eye on the magpie sitting on the Buddha's head in the garden, and the other on the screen, trying to figure out how to introduce myself to this community.
I am a musical old unrepentant hipster in my late fifties, my kids raised and out of the house. Even within the constraints of "back against the wall economics" I have managed to live surrounded by beauty and a bit of adventure.
These days my fixation is on trying to gain an as accurate as possible picture/understanding/grasp of the fascist forces at work that move our "leaders" around like pawns, and create wars for profit.
I am concerned about the future for our children and our grandchildren.

I love everything about the SilkRoad.
I was just scanning thru a rolling stone magazine when I saw a mention of this place and thought to myself "No Way." In checking it out my mind is blown.
What a great setup.
What a thing of beauty it is that this community can share information with each other without the typical judgement hypocrisy.
I am also very impressed by the patience shown by the members/moderators in answering all the redundant questions about bitcoins and security.

I hope that I can bring something to this community that I am glad to be part of.

One offering to those who may share my interest in trying to connect the dots below the surface of contemporary politics is the "Deep Politics Forum."  The researchers are top rate.  I consider the site a treasure.

I wish the very best to this community and to this magical endevor.

                                                                                                          Sincerely,
                                                                                                                             juan freemann

One last thing, loved GaryOaks info on psychedelics in the tripping lounge thread. Very cool.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: asdf345 on September 15, 2012, 03:03 am
I'm not really new, I've been on SR about a year and lurking around these forums for about the same. I've been busy working up a rep on SR as a reputable seller and thought it was time I dropped by and said hi :)

What's there to say about me? I'm a nice guy to my customers, and will go above and beyond to resolve any issues. I'm a bit OCD with my process and if it's not perfect I have trouble sleeping. Perhaps it's my need for validation and approval from strangers, who knows. It's been working out for my customers though :)

When I'm not dealing with customers, I'm quite different. I can be a cunt who loves a good debate. I have a tendency to be combative, though it's usually only with stupid people. I find it hard to let go of an argument when the other person isn't employing logic. I enjoy reading about anarcho-capitalism. A favourite youtuber is http://www.youtube.com/user/stefbot/videos?flow=grid&view=0 though I don't always agreed with everything he says, I love the thoughts and debates he sparks.

I'm reading Krishnamurti's "Freedom from the known" at the moment.

I'm listening to the track "Snow And Lights" by Explosions In The Sky and it's providing quite a interesting backdrop to my ramblings at the moment.

I've been on the road for a year and a few days now - looking forward to what the next year brings.

Post by: ExiledKeef on September 22, 2012, 07:23 am
Hey all    Keef here

Weekend warrior with many years experience.   Very excited to be part of this community and looking forward to getting to know some of you.   100% consumer here with ZERO interest in selling.    Fortunate enough to be a purely rec user.   My heart goes out to those here with genuine medical needs that can't be met through more conventional channels.   Sellers, please be kind to those folks.

Interested in several wares available here on SR, but primary mission is to find a reasonable and reliable regular source of top-quality coke.   Also interested in trying some nice exotic weed strains I've seen here as well.   Then again, I haven't acid in like 20 years.   And then theres...  Jesus, there's a goddamn veritable cornucopia of goodies here !    But I digress... Mostly, I'm tired of the disappointment of my local adulterated, underweight, overpriced street crap and long for the stuff like I used to get when I wore a younger man's clothes.   And getting delivery to my door in a few days like placing an Amazon order sounds pretty cool.

I guess that's it for now.    Got to figure out this bitcoin thing and get my account loaded up so I can do something other than just talking about it.   Feel free to contact me if you want to connect.   My SR name is the same there as here.    GL to all and please be safe.

Peace
Keef  8)

n00b here.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: may on September 23, 2012, 07:23 pm
Quote from: mond on September 23, 2012, 07:03 pm
Hi, I like a smoke [who doesn't]. Will someone please give me an idiots guide on how to obtain bitcoins and make a purchase. I am not a computer whizzkid and i need a simple guide. Please, Please Help! Mond
Getting bitcoins depends a lot on what country you live in, so you might want to use the search in the Tor browser to find a guide for your country. Bitcoins aren't specific to SR, so you could look for information on the clearnet/normal internet.

Post by: IHeartMandy on September 24, 2012, 06:19 pm
Hi, i am a new buyer on the road. I have no intention of becoming a vendor any time soon, however i hope to become active in the community, giving informative reviews of my favorite drug - MDMA. You can probably tell by my username that Mandy is my drug of choice and i have already kicked off my SR career by purchasing a gram of the stuff from WeCookUk (http://silkroadvb5piz3r.onion/index.php/silkroad/item/5f08e1fa9c). The feeling he described for his Mandy is exactly what i am looking for. I ordered before 6pm, so hopefully i will get it tomorrow to write up a review asap ;)

I have spent a while browsing the community forums and it has taken until now to get involved. All i can say is this place represents everything society should  strive to be. Open, honest and above all else safe. For so long i have had to risk buying drugs on the street where i would end up taking God knows what and half the time wouldn't even get high. Now, i can buy from reputable vendors, check out reviews and testimonials and get it delivered to my Door.

Keep it up guys, much love to all the vendors here on the road.

Hello to the Silk Road forums.

I am named after my band, Penguins On Radioactive Nitrous, or P.O.R.N for short. I am fairly new to Silk Road, I heard whispers of such a site and then spent a long time researching about a very different and interesting side of the internet. My first purchase was Q Dance pills which blew my head off and I've been enjoying the road ever since.

Nowadays I have a very busy life with not much time for taking drugs however what really floats my boat, oddly, is collecting drugs. I have quite a variety and am always looking for new substances to add to my collection. I hope to one day make a Ecstasy collection case and fill it with all the various pills that come up for sale on the road.

As for myself I enjoy many things, I enjoy posting on forums, going to gigs and festivals, building boats, learning about search engine optimization and most of all I love laying in fields and checking out the fantastically magical clouds up above.

Happy Wednesday to you all,

Penguins On Radioactive Nitrous.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: GGGreenbud on October 03, 2012, 09:21 pm
       I am GGGreenbud, and as my name implies, I am a "Good Guy Greg" most of the time(not my real or SR name).  I'm still a noob to SR, although I have been on the site for a while.   I like to help people, a bit too much sometimes.  I have been really into computers and the Internet since 21 years ago, when as a kid I hacked into the local University to get Internet Access.  I have a university degree, work a few jobs, live in the US. I have tried almost everything I can get my hands on, except for some of the more exotic drugs.  I never really got too deep into cocaine, but the Opiates, especially the #4 from Colombia(and the Afghani), how I love the bitter dope and the joy it brings.   Well, it's fucked things up for me to a good extent, but no one has EVER died on my watch(GGG!).   I suppose I am a "connoisseur of fine intoxicants" (from McDermott's guide to the Depressants).
          Now, all I do is pop pills from my doc(and a few friends), smoke killer chronic nugz, and take psychedelics.  I like classic rock, led zeppelin, pink floyd, etc. as well as metal, speed metal, and other genres.  I get into the hip-hop a little, as well as world music, particularly latin music.  I love SR and it's members, I have always thought that something like this should exist, and the people here seem really cool.  I am a civil libertarian with an anarcho-socialist philosophy, and I do not agree with the Gov't and how it uses violence to punish people for using and selling drugs.  I don't know really know very many people who can get the stuff I want, when I want it, except for here on SR, due to a number of circumstances.  I like to garden, sail, hike, fish, and enjoy the great outdoors.
Well,  thats me ! GGG! "What are you looking at? hit that!" -Me

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: LiNuXtoker on October 04, 2012, 06:25 pm
LiNuXtoker here to say hello to everyone. Also I must say thanks to whoever runs this excellent service.

My story is that my wife was diagnosed with MS several years back. Until then, we had last used as teenagers when we met. We stopped smoking when the first child was born. We did use at parties when other shared but buying was difficult as we live in a small village and still seem as the new folk 20 years later!

So, I was lucky to meet up with an old friend who was growing. That actual weed was sold here! At first, I could not even use Tor but was given a USB stick which just works! I am clueless about computers, and now I know that you press F12 (or another number on some compuers) then you choose to start from the choices of DVD drive, floppy drive (?) the hard drive which has window plus the USB stick. So I pick the usb and everything just works!!!

Well, the grower sells to some other guy who sells here. I usually buy one ounce at a time, trhis lasts for maybe 3 weeks or longer depending on how bad the MS gets. For years we have been dealing with post delivery and using the clear_net (the ordinary internet and not this Tor) the difference here is that you use the bitcoins which I will confess I don't understand yet. I have a wallet with 25 bitcoins but don't want to mess this up so will read more about how to make these digitalised coins get to SR!!! simple I think but right now I am trying to upload the wallet here, but see nothing to do that. I know to read the WIKI, so after saying hello I will spend weeks understanding how this works.

I work using computers but we have a tech dept and any problems, we go there.

But I cannot ask them to upload my coins, if they don't smoke I don't know if they do. For years due to buying through the post it was easy to send money or buy whatever from Ebay or even Amazon! (people sell weed that way!) But buying off strangers is a worry. I have lurked in the forums and don't like to see people being taken for the scam! Robbing my wife of her medicine is fucking wrong. As for it being illegal, the village copper knows my wife uses cannabis and does not trouble us. So many people keep saying that cannabis is not a medical use but please, I can see my wife go from agony to watching TV and doing homework for some course she is on.

The drugs from the doctor for the pain are opiates. These are FAR more addictive than the cannabis. After breaking a few bones, I was on diamorphine then prescribed codeine (which I still get) The wifes painkillers are now just thrown in a bag ready to be handed back to the shop. We still get the piankllers as my wifes sickness benefits (she worked all her life till the MS stopped it) will NOT be given unless she can prove she is in pain. We cannot say that she is using cannabis and our GP told us to say that. He knows, he does not mind but told us that she would be classed as a 'drug user' and her benefits stopped. We bought our place when both working so lucky we have have that. The children have left but they all know their mother uses cannabis and do not have any issues. As children, we would not use, but perhaps it would have been easy to use the garden or just go for a walk.

So, instead of buying in 'the real life' I am now here because I can buy the exact same bud I was getting and I am assured it is 'Med Price' which is what my guy has for a few customers with illness. It is based on income this price and a LOT lower than prices on the street or even off honest dealers who might do a med price. Few do this but maybe we are lucky and most other med users get no discount. In real life it is easy to see if anyone needs med weed. But here, I think people would abuse the system plus we have no way of proving. In real life, our guy does check prescriptions. Some medical conditions might be made worse by cannabis. We are friends so its not like a stranger demanding to see proof.

My grower friend has not got a lot and most is sold at normal prices, Here we pay anything from 180 to 240 for an ounce. Hash is more expensive but we get some foreign imported Morocco and Indian Charas. The choice here is amazing, which is why our guy said to join and check out the amazing menu. Hash is important for my wife, as she tends to use a Sativa for daytime and for sleep some hash. She will use an opiate painkiller but has cut down so much we have boxes of those. We have thought about selling them here but we think opiates are just too addictive and we could not live with that. Shame really, we could buy a few ounce of hash! But, if you need opiates, see a doctor, not a dealer! We seen too many friends die of heroin over the years. Even in a small village heroin is a problem.

Sorry for the lenghty intro but we use speech to text software and its very very very good as we can simply speak and it types out what we say. With MS, the ability to type even a few words is sometimes impossible. Cannabis eases the symptoms and helps sufferers to do things again. Making my wife a criminal is a disgrace and I will say to ANY policeman or women reading this that although we break laws, what would youy do if a loved one was in agony and could find relief in cannabis? You might say you woud take the legal drugs which means diamorphine, opiates and opioids. These drugs do not allow my wife to function and carry out simple tasks. She needs so much opiate that she is pretty much 'nodding out' something she does not want and something she wants only when she wants to sleep.

In the morning, my wife will smoke a joint around 7.00am. She never ate breakfast but now she will eat something! She will maybe smoke a joint around 10.00am. Around 1-2pm, another joint. Then she has a joint she smokes half of, then fisnishes off after dinner at 5.30pm or so. She watches soaps. Another joint. She then prefers hash if we have some. So my reason for being here is twofold. I can buy off my guy still - plus he admits to knowing some 'team' which grows a shitload of varieties! The second and main reason is to get some hash here, but I am going to have to study a lot and will not make impulse buys.

I know that 'vendors' here cannot do med prices, but maybe some of you should. I can send you proof of medical needs and don't give a fuck about the law. Any judge would do what I am doing.

So, I'm new here, a bit confused by how it even works but have been told 'its easy'.

One thing I hav worked out is to link to listings of hash. Do vendors see this? If they do I am just linking to you because I need to seriously compare prices and make sure I am buying genuine hash. I trust my guys hash 100% but here, I see some selling 'soap bar' which is a health hazard. I knw how easy it is to make Indian Charas 'cut'. The kids in India mix cow shit with Charas and sell to the tourists. In the UK most hash is disgusting and I would NEVER offer it to my wife and be calling back to anyone who tried to do that. Here, I cannot do this, there is no chance to ask for money back IF you get burnt.

So I am looking for honest UK hash traders. I need pure hash. This is for medical reasons and I arely smoke it myself and prefer beer, ciggarettes and maybe cocaine a few times a year to just chill. I gave up my job to be a full time carer. If you are in the UK and sell hash then work out how much that is. And its a full time job on call 24/7.

So that is myt reason for being here.

Silk Road are my pharmacy. Without this, I would have my real life guy, but as he says, he could get busted and then I'd need another connection so I will try to find vendors here who might do med.

Thanks for listening to me.

Dragon software I use - hook up a microphone and try it, you can roll a joint for your friend as you type on Silk Road.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Ahoyhoy on October 10, 2012, 06:30 pm
Quote from: sirjoss88 on October 10, 2012, 04:37 pm

There are indeed scammers on SR, but I have not been scammed as yet. I have three rues which I apply rigorously.

1. Never be the first customer of a new vendor. Wait for the feedback.
2. Check forums before buying.
3. Don't FE unless you are absolutely sure about the legitimacy of the vendor.

Stick to the above and you won't go far wrong...

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Theodore Geisle on October 17, 2012, 12:03 am
Hello everyone. I recently joined the SR community.I am an old fart, been enjoying ethno-botany since the 60's. It is so sad that things like this would not be needed if we could just have our own way in our own gardens. But, it is a blessing never the less that this place exists. Remember the wild west days of the web when you could just about get whatever you wanted until about 5 years ago ?  I would think it is probably safest to order things from inside ones own country. I know that one customs seizure letter to me was enough to cure me from ordering from overseas.Anyhow i am not very computer savy so i am still in the learning phase about bitcoins and the other politics about this site. I hope to be an asset not a liability

Hey Fellow Seekers of Freedom --

We are a new vendor on the Road and are currently --as we type-- in that bardo between the first mailings' being put in the post and their having arrived safely at their destinations.  We love us some good drugs, and we have us some delicious MDA to share with afore-mentioned Fellow Freedom-Seekers.  And the ILF is happy to talk about the Jeffery, (a word we've heard for MDA, apparently a cross-breed of "Who's got the Jeff Mills?" and "Hi, I'm looking for Molly"), as well as other psychedelics, the injustice system, philosophy, ego-death, and kittens, all day long.  Peace ya'll!

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: StatePalaceFun on October 25, 2012, 04:30 am
What's up Fellow Silk Roaders?
     I go by many names around my area, somewhere on the Gulf Coast. For all Silk Road purposes, you all can call me SP, short for State Palace Theater. For anyone not familiar with State Palace Theater, Google it. You can also read about the many raids, but I won't go into that here. For short, the govt fucked up a very good thing.
     As for my new life on the Silk Road...I see many new relationships to be made and plan on helping to make Earth a smaller place. SR is the future and we are a lucky few that have learned of this awesome place. I believe we should keep our mouths shut, because pride always comes before the fall...and there is no damn reason to boast about this site to anyone. I hate to be greedy, but I've seen too many great things, (Raves, Pain Clinics, Synthetic Weed, RC's, Border Crossing, Narco Tourism, etc..), all go to shit, because they got so popular. All good things come to an end. I believe something else will take the place of SR, but let's do our best to not speak of this thing of ours!
     What do I plan to contribute? I have already made 5 purchases in the last month, since I learned of SR. This was more of a "test the waters" scenario. Every purchase has come in without a problem. I have not ordered outside the country yet, but will soon. I love using PGP and only have problems finding somewhere to send my mail.
      I will also be opening a sellers account soon. I do not want to give much information on my products, but will make a new forum post, with samples, when that time comes. I wish I could say more on my plans to open shop, but I have already said too much. I am an honest person and was never into drama. Jacking people is just not my M.O., or my friends, and it never will be. All I was born with, is my balls and my word. I also do not sell anything that is not good enough for me. I hate when motherfuckers keep the good shit for themselves and sell the shake. Let me get a cola bitch and you can keep the popcorn buds!
      Look forward to working with as many of you as possible,
      "SP from Gulf Coast"

Things I enjoy:
   Mary Jane (KB and Synthetic)*mainly Sativa and CB with high affinity for CB1, Psychedelics, Nbome Series, MDMA, Weed/Hash, MXE, Ketamine, GHB, Benzo's, I also enjoy many RC that I have tried, but don't wish to name them all. I have yet to have a Phenethylamine that I didn't care for.

Things I enjoy, but try and stay away from:
   Opiates, Meth, Coke

Cant stand:
    Crack, LSD or Mushrooms with no Xanax, Piperazines.

(I'm sure I am forgetting a few of my favorite molecules.)

P.S. I learned of SR on my own. No one introduced the site to me and I refuse to show anyone. I hope everyone else does their best to keep their mouth shut.

Hey, I'm AnonUser13. (wish I could change that name) Sorry I've taken so long to introduce myself. I only found these forums on Sunday, and I'm playing catch-up as fast as I can. There's a lot of information to digest here. :(
 
I was born in the Netherlands and migrated with family to Australia in the 60's , and you have no idea how much THAT pisses me off.  I've fooled around with weed, speed, and psychedelics since the 70's. I've tried a lot of other shit, but in the end, I love my sativa. Pretty soon people are going to be calling me 'senior citizen'. These days I spend a lot of time wondering what the stuff in the nursing home is going to be like. I visit a relative in a home on a regular basis, and I always see a lot of people sitting and doing nothing but drooling, I'm guessing things are gonna be really good!! Anyways, I'm an ex-serviceman (navy), I have University I.T. qualifications and have been in business for myself a couple of times. Hopefully something I've learned along the way will be of use here!

I'm looking forward to getting to know you all better. SR is so blowing me away. Thank you, all of you, for making SR happen. Finally some like minded people!!!

See you around SR and the posts!!

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Virmo on October 29, 2012, 10:07 am
Welcome welcome welcome  :P

Kids all think they will never do drugs, me thinks :p

I prefer lsd over mushrooms.
Take your time to find quality, because sometimes things are pricy here while not being of good quality. For example: I once had a so called : "old" blotter tab of acid, which was medium strenght. Half of it was stronger than I ever had taken before. Stronger than 4-10 other kinds of tabs or even microdots.

So do your research, try stuff out and happy sr'ing :)
