Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Virmo on October 29, 2012, 01:54 pm
Actually I would not buy lsd on SR. The prices are totally at least twice too much.
1 blotter tab should be strong and should be between 0.5 and 0.7
Perhaps 1btc, but never more and then they'd have to be ultra strong.

I usually get them for free :)

One I get a vendor account up and running, while looking for IRL dealers in the meantime, I will try to sell proper LSD with proper prices. And not some other random crap on the blotters.
LSD stands for love, smile and dance for me. And is the opposite of cocaine/heroine.
A few years back I could sell them for 2 euro's a hit :D

I'm out of cash, and will be for a while. Have some btc's stored to try things out on the net. But getting a vendor account is 13+ btcs and I really don't have that. And also I'm asking questions here and there to see if and what products I could sell.
So any donations would be welcome (see signature txt for btc link).

BTW: I have gone seen people go to shit with drugs as well. Mostly from stupid combinations, or stuff like cocaine/heroine/speed. Even benzo's (those are pretty addictive and withdrawal is intense).
The psychedelic psychonauts I know who trip occasionally actually gained mental health (not including the 3 of them who had schizophrenia triggered.. but they would have become schizo sooner or later anyway, so I don't blame the drugs).

Makes me think. Maybe I should become a psychedelic vendor who only sells psychedelics (duh), and stuff to get rid of bad trips (like an antipsychotic/vitamine c, walking etc.).
Then again... I need money to survive in this shit world with the economic crisis.

But I'll probably never actually get enough btc's to become a vendor so until then I'll just keep dreaming.

ps: if you like mdma and mushrooms (and the combo), try 2cb sometime. I loved it.

Title: Introducing myself + got links for me?
Post by: ValiantExplorer on October 29, 2012, 10:07 pm
Hello to everybody in this shady corner of the Internet : ). And I mean this with no disrespect, quite the contrary. A few weeks ago, I had my first MDMA experience thanks to a friend who purchased it from here.

So when I say "shady corner of the Internet", I imagine a warm, dark place where some people sit together, in friendship. People who want to see their life through other facets of their brains, facets they never believed possible. Myself, I'm firmly AGAINST drug abuse, but I am extremely PRO experimentation / experience. Abuse is one of the things which made some substances illegal, and it's a pity. It's a pity because intelligent people never have to resort to abuse. They enjoy the precious special moments offered by a stimulant, they learn from it.

So I owe Silk Road one of the most illuminating experiences in my life. And now I'm here not only because I'd like to repeat that sometimes in the coming months, but also because I wish to introduce other people from my very close circle to it.

These days, I plan to learn a bit more about working with Silk Road & Bit Coins. I would appreciate some stuff to read if you got. I'm especially to learn why you seem to be sharing some keys around here in the Security forum, why MtGox has an exchange rate of only 10 USD for a BitCoin but BuyBitCoint.com and egoldfish.eu have outrageous prices and so on :).

Thank you & hi there! : D.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: FreedomOutlaw on November 09, 2012, 03:13 pm
Hi! My name is Freedom Outlaw, and I'm an alcoholic.

Oh wait....wrong forum.

I suppose the reason I came to Silk Road is because my street connection has become unreliable, and I don't have all of the connections that I used to have. I've been around the block a few times, and I've lived on both sides of the tracks. Getting too old for that shit, anyway. I just like to dabble every once in a while.

I am also interested in the "politics" and economic implications of anonymous markets, in general. I like the idea revolution through counter-economics. Bitcoin, Tor and PGP encryption have provided, or are providing, a means to facilitate these markets in a much safer way than traditional black and grey markets. Over the next few months I plan on exploring the possibility of starting a service that might attract normally "law-abiding citizens" to the Hidden Services of Tor. Sort of  like the episode of Seinfeld where Jerry buys an "illegal" shower head off of the street. The more restrictions and regulations the government places on the products that people want, the more people will seek alternative markets.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Mangazi on November 11, 2012, 08:29 am
Hi, I'm Mangazi, and I've known about the Silk Road for over a year, but never actually known how to get to it ;). It was with help of a forum, and a little search, that I learnt how to use Tor and get on here, about two months ago or so. I've since made two orders, the first one never came through, might have been lost, seized, or never sent because I had no history. I'm currently waiting for my second order of one gram of MDMA. The reason I came to SR is not to buy small amounts though, I am starting small because I literally have no money, which is why I came to SR, to get that international connection. After I get my gram of MDMA I will immediately sell it and earn enough money to buy five grams (shits expensive over here). After the five grams, the plan is to buy ten grams more, along with 100g of hashish. After that, 100g of weed.

I used to take drugs, but I rarely do nowadays. Drug abuse landed me into a lot of shit before, and I try to refrain from using because of that reason. I'm in it for the $.

Although I do have sufficient connects to get 100g of hash here, it's still going to cost me 2.5 times more than on the SR, and I won't be my own boss. So yes, in a sense, SR is going to move my game up a level or two.

Post by: T5 on November 11, 2012, 04:37 pm
Hello people,

Thought I would properly introduce this account since I just started posting without adequately introducing who's T5.

Well first of all, T5 isn't a single person. This account will be used by both me and partner. We run T5 on the Silk Road and we are selling NBOMes. We've been selling on SilkRoad for maybe 3 months now, and we've been buying for a little bit more than a year.

The downtime SR has experienced lately forced me to get on the forums since I still needed a SR fix ehe. I've discovered this hidden service maybe a year or so ago, when the website was still pretty small. Ever since, I don't need no other lover! SilkRoad represents everything a free world would expect: anonymity, simple transactions and great community!

Don't know what to say more, other than we hope we'll enjoy our time on the forums and on the market place :D

Hmmm by the way it may sound confusing using both "we" and "I". Let's say we'll use "we" when we'll be speaking of the business, and "I" when any of us make a personal post ;)

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: JohnGaltson on November 12, 2012, 03:09 am
Hello there and good day/night to you all:
 I live to get high. I used to be crazy about the stimulants but now  I have a prescription from a kaiser permanente doctor for vicodin (1 30ct. bottle of 5/500 pills per month) and opiates are my lady.  I'm allowed to refill my script once per month, and that is NOT enough. After I finish a bottle the next 3-4 weeks waiting to refill it are down-right torturous.  While searching for online pharmacies I found out about SR, and here I am. I've held off ordering for over a month so I could  research net security, btc and pgp but now I'm ready to make my first purchase, probably some form of oxy, because I've had a bottle percocet before when I had open heart surgery to get a mitral valve implant and fuckin loved that shit. And those were only 5mg oxy/325 mg apap. Of course now that I'm ready to go SR is down. Story of my life. Thanks for reading. .
Peace,
JohnGaltson

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: AplusPapers on November 27, 2012, 04:33 pm
Hello everyone!

After long deliberation, I have decided to join the Silk Road community selling my writing.

Although I can write anything under the sun you may need, my primary focus is to write university level essays and research papers. I charge on a per-page basis with references included free of charge. If it's quality you need, look no further. I custom write your essay based on what directions you give me, so you won't have to worry about your professor recognizing a paper with your name on it. Additionally, I never reuse any writing, as that can seriously jeopardize your academic career. I have worked as an English teacher for a long time and I know what professors like to see.

Anyway, check out my profile at: http://silkroadvb5piz3r.onion/silkroad/user/51b39bb99f

I hope to work with you soon.

With questions...
I am a 49 y/o female and have joined the Road in search of pain relief. I was diagnosed with arthritis in April and am in pain most of the time and the doctors will not do a damn thing for me (not old enough, not young enough, I guess...) My questions are 1. I need a recommendation on how to get bitcoins. I have been to 2 sites for them and one closed and one is not working properly. 2. Reputable pain management specialists...I need one! I take opiates for my pain and, actually, have some Xanax and some other items that I could trade in lieu of bitcoins...just let me know! I hope you all have some advice for me (and yes, I have been reading the "required" reading...but, I'm impatient)
Thanks, y'all, in advance!!!

GBC Gal :o

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: shunyata on November 28, 2012, 04:43 am
Hello new friends! My name is Shunyata and I can not believe this place actually exists! I always dreamed and believed that a place like this exists and even had dreams about it, so WOW! I am so thankful! I came here after I was branded by the medical system. I have a real painful condition and I am sick and tired of ruining my liver and other organs with tons of OTC drugs which do not even touch my pain. All I want is to be able to live my life, go to work, take care of loved ones and not be in constant dull pain while doing it. Needless to say I am here for the pain pills but also to find new friends and share some spiritual ideas and maybe even some science ideas. I must say, I thought it would be harder to find my way around here but I guess I am not as dumb as I my evil drs think! The fact that we don't have to make shady deals in the "bad" part of town to get some responsible fun or proper health management is amazing! I hope one day all of us can find true happiness!  ;D Peace! I have many questions but I will start reading and searching...rather than asking here....

Title: Hey ya'll! Get some Love!
Post by: LoveOne on December 08, 2012, 01:24 am
I am LoveOne.
Spreading the Love.
I have been around and try to pay attention.

The mass of an atom is 99.9+% positive.
So while negative parts exist to provide contrast, balance and connectivity.
They are NOT equal in power to positivity.
Not even close to equal.

This is subjective symbolism of course.
That physical template I am using to describe a moral reality.
Reality is what we, the viewers/actors, decide and agree on is real.

So take your personal symbolism and belief system and apply that atomic fact to your life.
The rocks actually do speak!
Darkness and Light exist yes, but they are not equal.

So relax kids, if you are riding the waves of Light, fear not!
If you are in league with darkness, beware!
Of course all is energy.
So keep it moving!

LoveOne

@RKL

Yes I was a hardcore skater as a kid.
Just mentioning that has brought me back.
Thank you!
Although I didn't drop acid until later in life, I'm still there with ya!
Riding that memory lane.
Cheers!

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Galtourpa on December 08, 2012, 08:54 am
Hi to all on SR.

I am an artist of fine art, street art and electronic music producer. I am a stimulant and MDMA lover. I had wanted to try MDMA for years but never came across any then around 6 years ago while on a stimulant hunt "the guy" said I don't have any stim but I have these pills. Tried one quite liked it then thought I better get some of that Trance music as that's what I've heard you listen to with this stuff, within a few weeks of listening and dropping my life had changed forever. I had experiences I never thought were possible, I felt emotions and pleasures like nothing I had ever experienced. My art changed in a wonderful direction and I started producing the music I love so very much. Rather than a bad thing in my life these chemicals have been nothing but good and mind expanding. And the most wonderful thing the person I share this life with has come along for the ride and fallen for the same chemicals and music as I.

I became a member a few days ago, since then I have been having a bit of a look around, checking out what is what. I have not made any purchases as yet, I have seen many products I would like but are taking my time to make sure I get things right.

I see nothing but positives with this great site, the people seem very nice and genuine and with luck now I will not have to run the gauntlet of dodgy dealers, rip offs, poor quality and constantly having to find the product in the first place. This is how society should be, I do not drink I do not smoke and to have fun or simply to alter my consciousness I have to be a criminal. So be it, I am who I am. Maybe society will catch up with us one day.

Look forward to getting to grips with encryption and actually purchasing.   

Galtourpa

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: BrianWilson on December 12, 2012, 02:53 am
I am a college student in the US, studying jazz. I came to SR mostly because I wanted to find acid. I'm a big fan of any psychedelics, and a binge smoker (I smoke weed constantly for a week to a month and then abstain completely for about an equal amount of time). I really love the honesty of this place, since you have the internet at your fingertips and the ability to post anonymous reviews, it's easier not to get ripped off. I love the creativity that acid and weed give me when I'm writing music. I had a pretty wide variety of experiences in my childhood, culminating in my being put into a residential treatment place (not for drugs), but I learned to get along with society with the help of the loving herb. I'm a pretty well-put-together guy now, I always read a lot as a kid and my parents raised me well enough not to become a degenerate I guess. Well enough self-love for me.
BTW it's BrianWilson after the musician, my favorite musician and biggest influence.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: livingdeadgirl on December 12, 2012, 11:16 pm
 :o OMG, I thought my RPG friends were on BS when they put me on to SR, but I soon realized heaven does exist.....
Hi I'm a late 20's masseuse & dating site webmaster. Very happy to have found SR as I had to move from a MMJ friendly place to the bible belt & have been suffering since due to lack of quality, limited supply & annoying street politics dealing with the vendors here. I lurked around SR in a state of shock for 2days before i made my first 2 transactions. My drugs of choice: all things weed, coke, & opiates. I've read though a bunch of the intro's & it seems to be a friendly group of people & i'm glad to meet you all.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: extremelyflammable on December 13, 2012, 08:10 am
Hey there!

I've been a member of SR for a short time now so I thought I would come say hello and introduce myself.

I work in industry, and I spend a lot of time online. I've known and seen SR in action for about 6 months now, as friends of mine have been using the site. I finally took the plunge and started using SR myself with great expectations.

I've learned a lot in the last week through these forums and others outside of SR. TOR, PGP, BTC, all new and impressive to me atm, and I'm looking forward to learning more and putting things to good use.

Why did I come here? Well all good things can come to an end, and after 15+ years of personal use of recreational drugs, you would think I'd have by now a stable and reliable connection for purchasing. Well I pretty much do, but you know, people don't do things forever and times change. SR's MO really suits me at the moment, it would probably suit me for the rest of my life. So Im here now, giving it a go, seeing all the cool and amazing things available to us. I would very much like to make friends here so that I can learn more from you guys, share experiences, and establish good reputation with vendors. If you would like to send me a message, even something random, I would love to hear from you.

:)

it's easy for me to get weed and amphetamine in real life, but as a hobby psychonaut i'm always searching for new psychedelic experiences and it seems like SR is the place to be for that :-)

i'm 31 years old, male, from germany and i'm an it technician and .net programmer. at the moment i'm studying computer science extra-occupational.
my interests are weed (grower, but sadly not yet, because at my current flat it's not possible), psychedelic experiences, sf/fantasy and cyberpunk literature and since about 16 years i'm into the electronic music scene (mainly techno/experimental music).

i'm looking foreward to get good stuff and to meet nice people here at this community.

greetings

Post by: Jaemiisseo on December 14, 2012, 02:14 pm
Hello, my name is Jaemiisseo. I got some echo about SR when I was watching a documentary about DMT  ;D. As I've used different psychedelic drugs (marijuana and mushrooms mainly), I was very interested about it cause' people using DMT wrote something like 'Marijuana is nothing but DMT can connect you with the God' messages. Well, I'd like being connected with the God, so I started searching some info about DMT on my own. Have to say the substance is very, very interesting, especially if we realize it's contained in every single living creature and plant. So it's obviously no problem for experienced chemist to prepare it. Unfortunately for me, I'm not very good at chemistry so I can't prepare the substance on my own. Luckily, there was a guy that knew about this website and gave me an advice, saying 'Google 'Silk Road' and you'll find the answers on your questions'. To be honest, I was quite confused about his answer cause' I didn't know anything about SR and have never heard of it before. But I found it on wikipedia, so I'm here. And that's the whole story about me. Someone well informed in the preparation of DMT could help me and give me some tip on how to prepare DMT/Ayahuasca the most effectively. I was searching for it but there's a lot of  'recipes' and don't know which one should I choose.
But in order to introduce myself and not talking just about my DMT interest, I'd tell you something more about me. I'm a student of grammar school preparing for the university orientated on the Far East countries. I'm literally obsessed with China, Japan, Korea, Mongolia etc. with the countries' culture, people, stuff produced over there (especially in Korea and Japan) and languages. I'd like to move house over there to Korea. My other hobbies are B-Boying, automotive racing, music...and many, many more  ;D I'm also very interest in politics, mainly cause' of negative effects of socialism/collectivism on the society, that majority of people considers as good things somehow. It's very sad people think the government is good and free market is bad cause' it harms them so much but their only reaction is 'WE NEED MORE OF THE SAME!'. It will cost us a large dose of effort changing people's opinion about the free market and the role of state in their lifes. But one day, we will be free finally.
I hope there's a lot libertarians on the site! I would like to discuss the topic so feel free to message me :)

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: whowhatwhere on December 29, 2012, 10:58 pm
Hello everyone, my name is whowhatwhere.  I was aware of TOR for many years but came across Silk Road through the Gawker article in June 2011.  I believe I became a member of the Road shortly thereafter but I can't pinpoint exactly when.  I've also been lurking on these forums for over a year and enjoy the tremendous amount of knowledge shared here.. I feel like I know some of the more popular commenters already!!  I'm in my late 20's and have held a wide spectrum of jobs, from being in the military to construction work to pharmacy tech.  In the last 15+ years, I've tried most every drug imaginable, even some interesting research chems like AMT and 5-MeO-DiPT back when you could order them on the clearnet.  I live out on the West Coast in the United States and this site has been nothing but one fantastic experience after another!  I look forward to posting here more often!  ;D

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: sportshort on December 30, 2012, 07:27 pm
Greetings to all, and happy to have found you. I’ve been selling small-time weed for a while but never fully satisfied with my sources of supply, which can be inconsistent with quality and availability. One day I was dry and my disappointed customer asked me if I knew what Tor browser was, and I said yes because I had been using it for certain kinds of Internet browsing to keep the government from spying on me. Then he asked me if I had ever heard of Silk Road, which I had not, but he suggested I check into it. So I did. And here I am.

I’ve been browsing the SR site for a while, also reading heavily on the forum site, also reading heavily about PGP encryption and Bitcoin, trying to make sure I’ve got it right before making my first order. I’m no computer genius, but I’m good at following directions. This has, to say the very least, exciting possibilities. Thanks for being here, and looking forward to being a part of it. Happy New Year!

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: sinisterminister on January 01, 2013, 12:50 am
Saludos,

I'm the sinisterminister.  The name is derived from a song by bela fleck and the flecktones.  I'm 23 and have about 1.5  years until I finish my undergrad in MIS.

I'm fascinated by internal medicine and self medicate to a fault sometimes.  All in all, I feel balanced.  You gotta pick your poison but don't be surprised if it got ya feelin' damaged, life's a bitch but I would be god damned if I wouldn't buy me a Lamborghini, a 100 foot boat, so I can take in the scenery and on that note feel free to quote.  :-)

I'm a new seller, I'm offering Appalachian Hash at a discount rate to get things started. 1 oz for $200.  Also have gram listings up.

In addition, I offer a variety of antidepressants, prescription slips, and some card encoding equipment that I'm selling at a discount.

I'm a big fan of hatter26, truly an OG if there ever was one on SR I suspect.  I'd appreciate any tips or advice that other vendors could offer me. I've had a buyer acct. for about 6 months but just recently opened my first vendor account.

In particular, I'm interested in stealth tips.  Also, I'm in need of some 33-0-0 fertilizer for recreational activities and wargames.

Seal team 6 is solid, but the Mossad of Israel are more experienced and tougher, and far more ruthless.

I admire el chapo guzman, the most powerful drug kingpin in the world.  He has finally managed to take out top leaders of Los Zetas and swiftly captured their territory.  He's exponentially more powerful that Pablo Escobar was at the height of his power, he's also 20 years older and wiser by a factor of 10.  When Mexico does become a narco state, he'll be the one running it. The president of mexico has little authority or resources to challenge his Sinaloa Cartel.  The mexican army stood guard at his daughter's wedding.

Random fact, the richest man in the world, Carlos Slim, worth an estimated $74 billion, is from Mexico and currently lives there.
I think he and el chapo will be running Mexico within 10 years. hehehe, I just did a rail of some potent No. 4 H, forgive me for rambling.

It's good to be here.

Adios y que Dios este con usted.

Hello. I have a different account on the forums to on SR so as to maintain a higher level of security.

I am looking to sell various new pharmaceuticals domestically to Australians (just saving up money for the seller account). Just doing it as a service and will sell only slightly above cost.

I work in IT (sys/net admin) and am looking to further my education next year (Uni). And perhaps go into programming.

I use drugs to relax (alcohol, xanax), enjoy myself (ketamine, mdma, meph) and explore myself (lsd, 5-meo-mipt).

I don't touch weed as it seems to do nothing but give me insane anxiety, like all pains down the left hand side of my body (makes me think I'm having a heart attack) and give me restless legs/pains in my legs. Really low doses of weed seem to be fine or if I take it with a benzo it is really amazing).

I don't listen to music.
Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Chuckforit on January 04, 2013, 06:07 am
Hi,

My name is Chuck, or Chuckforit, or C4 if you want it simple.


Here's my drug-related curriculum-vitae:
I am an occasional cannabis-smoker (average 1 to 4 joints per week) with a 2 years experience. I find the joints and/or pipe to be more satisfying to buzz then the bong or any other tools. That is a personal opinion  I think that I can be proud to say that I have never bad-triped (If that is somehow related to cautiousness more than luck). I am not into trying harder drugs although I am kinda curious about them. I surf around Erowid sometimes (Which I highly recommend to any curious newbies like me).

On a more personal info, here's what I've decided to tell y'all cranky folks ;)
I enjoy music. in any form. Listening, playing, seeing, tasting, touching, writing and even sub-psychologically feeling (When you are 3-4 hours past your buzz peek and you sleep while listening to music max volume and you wake up with the entire song in your head for a week after).
I am not gonna start a list of my preferred bands or artists because that is not the goal of this posts and it's boring. Although, if you are curious about my taste, you can always message me and discuss freely about it.
My political opinion isn't very profound or based on any theory, but can be resumed in lexically-simple phrase; "Worldwide peace is much more than an utopia, it's a reset button for evolution of the universe".

Well, that concludes my brief resume.

Feel free to contact me.

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Cobia on January 10, 2013, 06:06 pm
Hello SR!

I started this journey when The Shroomery taught me how to grow mushrooms under my bed in high school.  Shortly after that I found the erowid link to canadarc (RIP I think?)

10 years later I've found and used lots of online drug sources,  I was kind of out of the scene for a few years (mostly bc I was on suboxone 24/7), but as I get clean I get bored, so I stumbled across SR.

This place/project is amazing.  People can do a lot of bad things with drugs, but at the end of the day prohibition just doesn't work.  At the end of the day if I (or anyone) wants to get high were going to do it.  I'd rather just use my credit card than drive into the ghetto though.

I think if SR continues to gain popularity and isn't destroyed by opposing forces, it will eventually force our global society to start legalizing/decriminalizing recreational drugs.  Even if SR itself doesn't make it, eventually the internet will bring about this change.  Even if governments got super anal about shipping, an anonymous Craigslist type website would suffice.

I'm excited about the future (minus this opiate withdrawal thing, but I'll survive)

Cobia

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Monty Cantsin on January 16, 2013, 02:28 am
Monty Cantsin is a multiple-use name that anyone can adopt, but has close ties to Neoism. Monty Cantsin was originally conceived as an "open pop star." In a philosophy anticipating that of free software and open source, anyone should perform in his name and thus contribute to and participate in his fame and achievements.

A multiple-use name is a name used by many different people to protect anonymity.

See http://eipcp.net/transversal/1202/aag2/en

Also: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multiple-use_name

It would be great if we all used Multiple use names,say we were all named Monty Cantsin or Luther Blissett .

Hello guys. My name is Raynardine, and I'm considering vending.

If I start vending, I'll probably start out reselling MDMA, 4-FA, Methylone, and other RCs domestically.

I guess we'll see.

In the meantime, I'm a born and bred frontiersman, who lives for the wild lawless lands untamed by so-called civilization.

I am a student preparing for grad school, and pursuing a doctorate in mathematics.

My passion is P2P networks, such as Tor and Bitcoin.

I want to design the ultimate P2P network which integrates Tor and Bitcoin into a single greater network.

Other passions include anonymous voice and video telephony, and instant messaging.

However, I am interested in vending, to help fund my doctorate in mathematics.

I'll need business partners, when the time comes.

It's great to see an amazing community where we are connected to oneanother for the promotion of fairness, equality and happiness  :D

Much Love to you all,

K Queen

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: EternalSunshineMan on February 15, 2013, 03:43 pm
Okay, so earlier on whilst hammerfied on bullit rye bourbon I accidentally posted this intro in some ridiculous fucking section I resurrected from 1400 years ago.  My apologies...apparently bourbon makes reasonable forum searching impossible.  In any case, here is my intro again (in the correct place this time...I hope....)

Hey guys, my name is Eternal Sunshine Man.  But you can call me "Day man, fighter of the Night man, champion of the sun, Master of karate and friendship for everyone" for short. 

I'm a young IT professional with a good job, a beautiful girlfriend, a great family, and a fantastic life.  I pay my bills, I pay my taxes, I have my own house, my own car, and a few animals I've rescued.  I work out 4-5x a week, I don't eat GMO food, I don't litter, and I support local business and fight global conglomerates, imperialism, corporatization, & oppression (I'm a avid progressive civil libertarian & local activist). I don't cheat on my girlfriend (anymore), and I don't even fucking speed (honestly)... I also take real good care of my friends.  And I work.....my..... mutha.....fuckin..... ASS OFF (like 12 hour days, its ridiculous)..................oh yeah, I also prefer heroin to scotch.   Does that make me a bad person? (if you said yes, than fuck you.  That was a rhetorical question dick). 

I'm an opioid man...long time user...very experienced...and I hope to contribute to the opioid community, and really to any SR community for that matter, as much as I can. And though my love is opioids, I do have experience with everything under the sun.  I'm sure I can add to any discussion anywhere if only at the very least I offer some ridiculousness.  And please, feel free to tell me to shut the fuck up anytime (like now for instance)...I'm not shy, and I love some ball breaking.  So if I start popping off on some stupid shit, tell me..Please! Don't ever hesitate to tell me if I'm being a dumbass, or how you feel.  I'm a newb, and I'm here to learn.  So teach away!  Thanks guys for listening, and I hope this intro is well received and that we all have a long and fruitful relationship in the SR community!

PS. Is there a cream for left nut itchiness? Just left, the right one is fine.
Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: sleepyeyes2k2 on February 17, 2013, 09:08 am
Greetings, fellow travelers.  My path to the Road was really curvy.  I was a church pastor, became an atheist, then was a cop, joined the military after 9/11, got blown up in Afghanistan, and retired to an undeclared part of the US.  Along the way, my political views swung from center right to far left, as did my attitudes about drugs.  When my wartime injuries caused me so much more pain than my doctors could capably treat, I sought pain medication first on the streets, then on the world wide web, and finally landed on the Road.  There, I finally found a nonviolent way to get the treatment I needed.

What I didn't count on finding was the vibrant community of people from all over the world, sharing interests, concerns, and ideas the way you do in the Forums.  I am super happy to be here, and I hope that some of you will end up being my friends.
Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: homertortoise on March 03, 2013, 02:16 am
Hello all.

My name is Homertortoise. I recently graduated from the newbie board... which is pretty bad ass!. I've yet to make my first purchase on SR... but its only a matter of time before I do. I have to wait for certain personal circumstances to settle down before I can do so.

That being said, I've been on the boards for a while. I'm excited to make my first purchase and I'm excited to contribute more on the boards going forward.

I'll basically only be focused on buying small personal amounts of bud and shrooms on occasion. Though I'm somewhat interested in venturing out a bit further in the world of psychedelics.

Any advice and of you can give for first time buyers (beyond the basic stuff) is greatly appreciated. I'm especially interested in hearing some advice from those with steady careers and relationships that don't want to risk those.

I am a musician and poet, living in a deep dark forest.  My biggest experience with drugs is with mushrooms, Liberty Caps, who grow wild in copious amounts in my region. Other drugs I've tried are LSD, Cannabis, 2C-B and n2o. I read a lot of classical literature and philosophy. I love learning <3

 I like tripping and doing martial arts. I avoid amphetamines and opioids, enjoying the hallucinogens instead :)

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: ByronLegosi on March 14, 2013, 01:20 am
Hi SR,

I'm ByronLugosi (the forum name is a deliberate change, it's an injoke I regret now so please ignore it)
I'm new to SR as a vendor though on a different (and obv unnamed account) I have bought for a while.

I'm mainly selling opiates because I have the good fortune to be able to get a lot of them where I am and would like
to pass that good fortune onto you guys.

There is an ulterior motive. For about a year I was on roughly 100-200mg of Oxynorm a day, which was costly and
very difficult to stop. However, I did manage to stop but have continued to buy the script. To stop myself using again
I'm selling it all and honestly, the fun of seeing that extra order and sealing the envelope and posting the goods is making
up for the lack of opiates. I still use the odd MST or Subbies just to keep the hardest WD away but in way less quantities.

I have an exceptional tolerance to drugs, an overactive liver to be precise, which is a pain in the arse as I refuse to IV so when
I buy I buy in bulk. I also have a HUGE love affair with K, though since moving south everything has been relatively shit.
I swear people are cutting K with methox. If you are, BAD PERSON! lol.

Anyway, I'm probably going to be an active member on the forums. I'm a software engineer and spend a lot of time on my PC
so I have plenty of opportunities to come on.

Look forward to getting to know some of you!

All the best!

Byron Lugosi

p.s. I've said before, if you can get my names relevance then I'll send you 4 free Morphine Sulphate 100mg tabs. PM me if you think you get it!

Post by: CannaKingUK on March 14, 2013, 01:29 am
Hi there, I'm CannaKingUK but normally use the acronym CKUK when referring to myself. I'm a UK based grower of quality cannabis, and have been for years. I've had lots of experience with face-to-face transactions and most looking forward to becoming a SR only seller. I never deal in anything other than what I can produce myself. I'm professional. I'm a fair person. I grow organically. I'm happy to share my growing knowledge with anyone who has a question.

I'm growing specifically for the UK SR market. Our country needs a quality vendor at reasonable prices, and I hand on heart believe that person is going to be me. I really hope to look back at this comment in a years time and think, "you said you'd do it and you did :D". I can sit hear and big myself up all day, but I won't waste anymore of your valuable time.

All I can say is remember my name, I'll be one to watch :)

CKUK

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: seeyallnextyear on March 16, 2013, 11:35 pm
Hello there all you beautiful party people!! Been meaning to post an intro here for a while now, just keep forgetting to do so.  Anyhow, y'all can call me SeeY'allNextYear.  Why you ask?  Because I'm not telling you real name.  Of course.  Fans of earlier seasons of Family Guy will understand where I got the name from.  Remember the greased up deaf guy?  "You can't catch me!!"  "See y'all next year!!"

I am still kind of a "newb" here on the SR I guess, but I am in no way new to the crypto-market communities.  I was a vendor on another site for a couple of months and did very well until my hook got pinched.  I decided to come on over to the road because it has gone through some really impressive growth spurts over the past year or so. 

I think this place has the potential to get big enough to be completely unstopable. There are so many people on here now it is crazy!!  Of course, that can be a bad thing.  But not if the majority of us keep our faith in each other as well as this market system.  I don't see the Road going anywhere for a while.  But if it does, the blame can be placed on everyone of us.

You've gotta help out your neighbor before he'll help you of course!  Keep each other's back and stay a team.  The only enemies we have are the ones who aren't using SR.  You can't call the scam artists on here enemies.  Reason being, the only way they scam is by asking someone to FE.  I truly believe FE should never be used.  EVER!  What are 90% of the problems people on this site have?  Getting screwed because they FE. 

Just don't do it people...  Not worth it.  If everyone starts refusing to FE ever, there will be no point in anyone asking anyone to do so. 

There it is!!  And here I am!!! 

So here I am! 

Golden Rules  ~ Don't ask me my name, don't ask me to lie, don't ask me to cheat, don't ask me to steal.  And for the love of Pete, don't ask me to FE!!!  Cause it ain't happening!!

Title: Re: Introduce Yourself! (For all new to Silk Road and existing members)
Post by: Panzerknacker on March 26, 2013, 03:31 am
Hey Everyone. I'm sure this will get lost in a sea of similar comments, but I'll do an introduction.

My name's Panzerknacker. Which was a German character similar to the Nutcracker who ate tanks. I absolutely love bass music. As in low frequency, not the fish. But I'm also an avid outdoorsman and long distance backpacker. I'm a definite geek and drug "connoisseur" (I like to do a lot of research to gain an understanding of everything I take), but had only ever heard about the Silk Road, never bothering to check it out. Sat down one day and it turned out to be a lot easier than expected. Now that I've made a few purchases... I'm hooked.

The beauty of this website, in my opinion, is to allow responsible people like myself to choose their own experiences based on actual data. Knowing exactly what you're getting, what dosage, what strength, etc. Being able to have a "supply" so you can decide what points in your life are worth experiencing from an altered state. I love that. Over the many years I've been experimenting, one of the biggest disappointments is being a slave to your street dealer, in both price and supply. This site has changed all that! Now I am directly responsible for how much I spend, what I buy, and how much I personally have on hand.

Anyway, preaching to the choir here. But I'm excited. Did I mention I'm a long distance backpacker? I have ALWAYS wanted to take a low dose LSD trip out in the deep backcountry, but my timing never worked out. Here's to this summer!
